title: Fitatu Calorie Counter - Free Weight Loss Tracker
description:
Download Fitatu Free Calorie Counter and lose weight with over 10 million satisfied users slimming all over the world! 

Key diet app features: calorie counter, macro calculator, water tracker, food diary, meal planner, weight lose tracker, water reminder, easy healthy recipes & much more in one free app!

Fitatu Free App will help you achieve your diet, slimming and fitness goals in just 5 minutes a day. You'll lose weight, build a muscular figure and improve your health. By measuring your calories and nutritional values.

CALORIE COUNTER / FOOD DIARY (Fitatu main feature)
■ Specific nutrition information (calories, proteins, fat, carbohydrates), a total of 39 vitamins and ingredients including omega 3, vitamin K, vitamin B7, fiber, sodium, cholesterol, caffeine (macro calculator) - all in one food diary & calorie counter feature
■ Database of meals and dishes from restaurants (e.g. McDonald's, KFC, Subway, Pizza Hut)
■ Useful measures - e.g. spoon, packaging, piece, glass, handful, slice, and spoon
■ The largest database of meals and food products moderated by dietitians (100,000 new positions added monthly).
■ The easiest way to add food and products to your food diary (by predicting what you eat often and in what quantity)
■ Backup/export option - sending data to Google fit (or XLS/CSV files)

EASY HEALTHY RECIPES DATABASE (amazing new Fitatu feature!)
■ Easy & healthy food recipes database - moderated by dietitians 
■ Simple step-by-step cooking guide with photos
■ Cook tasty dishes and lose weight!

OTHER KEY FEATURES:
■ Own products from stores chains (e.g. Tesco, Asda, Morrisons, Sainsbury, Lidl).
■ Barcode Scanner
■ Calorie goal with automated calorific value and the proportion of proteins, fats and carbohydrates calculation (or insert your own values - macro calculator)
■ Your daily goals (option to set custom calories, proteins, fats and carb goals)
■ Calculate the appropriate calorie, carb and protein demand in calorie counter
■ Meal planner - with up to 6 meals daily 
■ Your own custom dishes and meals
■ Monitoring the consumption of any nutrient in the selected period
■ Summary of calorie and nutrition for the day, week and month (calorie counter) 
■ Shopping list for meal planner
■ Drink water with water reminder & water tracker
■ Mealtimes with meal reminder option (easy fasting)
■ Dark mode

FITNESS INTEGRATIONS:
■ Data sync with Google Fit, Apple Health, Fitbit, Endomondo, Runtastic Free, Nike+ Run Club, Garmin Connect, MiFIT, Strava, Samsung Health
■ More than 500 exercises (add you own home workouts or fitness exercises)

Download Fitatu Free Calorie Counter now to lose weight (or weight gain) with macro calculator, food diary, diet plan, meal planner, weight loss tracker, water tracker, easy healthy recipes and much more in one free diet app!"

comments: I love the layout of it however the database is letting it down. I'm adding things to the database on a nearly daily basis. Apart from that I like the app. None of the add nonsense that people have talked about in other reviews.

In-app marketing is too offensive. I want to test the app and if I like it, I will buy the premium version. Constant pop-ups are very annoying, especially after adding a meal! I know that you earn money from ads, banners are okay and maybe one pop-up per day, e.g. after adding first meal, but not all the time. This is really annoying and does not encourage to purchase the premium version. It does quite the opposite.

The app has potential. It is missing a lot of products from the U.S.. adding them is cool but then sometimes I make a mistake and it's hard to correct. something is wrong with the default calories calculator, it says that I need a deficit everyday of 1000kcal to lose 1lb per week, but to do that in reality you only need 500kcal deficit per day. The goals page is all messed up. It says that it takes 11 weeks to reach my goal of -8 lbs, but the rate of weight loss is 1.76/week.

Calories and activities imported from Google Fit does match. Also would be nice to be able to connect it to Huawei Health. Database is missing a lot of products. There should be an option to additionally add a picutre when adding a missing product so you can verify it and remove duplicates. Reward users for growing the database. It would be nice to suggest activity or meal based on current tracked data to meet the daily targets. Possibly to edit ingredients in meals and save them for later.

My first impression is an 9/10. The information that offers it is really complete. Furthermore, you can connect it with other Apps, what it is really helpfull if you want to track your diet. The design is not bad, I like it more than other Apps like My Fitness Pal, this could be improve by adding a Pie Chart to see the proportion (percentage) of carbs, protein and fats in your dayly or weekly intake

title: Carbs & Cals - Diabetes & Diet
description:
The revolutionary Carbs & Cals App contains over 3,500 food & drink photos with the carbohydrate, calorie, protein, fat & fibre values clearly displayed above each photo.

FOR TECHNICAL SUPPORT, QUESTIONS AND SUGGESTIONS: Please email info@carbsandcals.com and we'll be happy to help!

★ FOOD & DRINK DATABASE:  The App is currently available for the UK (3,500+ food & drink photos), USA (2,000+ photos) and Portugal (900+ photos), with the database being expanded all the time.

★ PORTION SIZES: Up to 6 portion photos for each item (perfect for portion control & weight loss!)

★ BRANDED FOODS:  Customer favourites, such as Kellogg’s, Domino’s, Danone, Weetabix, Ryvita, Yakult, Dorset Cereals, Innocent, Alpen, Nakd, Ready Brek… and many more coming soon!

★ FOOD & DRINK CATEGORIES:  22 different categories covering Biscuits & Crackers, Branded Foods, Bread, Breakfast, Cakes & Bakery, Desserts, Drinks, Eggs & Cheese, Fruit,  Ingredients (for cooking & baking), Meals, Meal Accompaniments, Meat, Chicken & Fish, Nuts & Seeds, Potatoes, Rice, Pasta & Grains, Sauces & Spreads, Seasonal, Snacks, Take-aways, Vegetables & Pulses and Yoghurt.

★ MY FOODS:  Take photos of your own food and add them to a customised list in the App!

★ MEAL CALCULATOR:  No need for scales or complicated calculations! Just look at the food on your plate, find the food in the App, choose the relevant portion size & add it to the Meal Calculator.

★ INTEGRATED CALENDAR: Store a breakfast, lunch, dinner & 3 snacks per day in the Calendar to keep track of the food & drink you consume each day. 

★DAILY TARGETS:  Calculates your estimated calorie & nutrient intake and gives you daily targets for carbs, cals, protein, fat & 5-a-day. 

★ RECIPE BUILDER: Add components of a recipe & the App will automatically calculate the nutritional information per serving.

★ EXERCISE: Calculates calories burned in a wide range of different exercise and keeps track of your activity in the Diary.

★ DOWNLOAD ALL IMAGES FACILITY: For using the App when no Internet access is available (e.g. in restaurants, on holiday, and when out & about.)

★ DIABETES AREA: Log your blood glucose readings and link the carbohydrate content of meals to the insulin calculator.

★ Compiled by Chris Cheyette MSc BSc (Hons) RD, Diabetes Specialist Dietitian & Yello Balolia BA (Hons), Photographic Artist.

PLEASE NOTE: The App is available for Android phones with OS 2.1 & up, with autofocus camera.

HAVE A SUGGESTION OR QUESTION? Email info@carbsandcals.com and we'll do our best to help you or improve the App and release a free update. PLEASE USE OUR EMAIL AS WE’RE NOT ABLE TO RESPOND TO MARKET REVIEWS.

comments: Android Phone? - Don't Bother! Being taught to use this app in the hospital to manage my newly diagnostic child, I was horrified to find that once discharged from the hospital and left to "go solo", everything that I had learnt was void as the app you rely so heavily on, doesn't actually work on android. Extremely disappointed that I paid my money in good faith for this app, only to discover that it does not have half the foods and you cannot change your weights to get exact carbohydrates.

Last update was 2018, no replies to emails! This is very lazy and evidences a lack in development. Many common foods are missing or it is fussy regarding food names. This could easily be resolved with more variables and again evidences lazy development. It's also slow to use and states "downloading" every time launched. The included basal bolus system is useless, you have to manually calculate carbs and there isn't anywhere to input a correction ratio, or reduction ratios for exercise etc.

Good idea but outdated. Given the current technology this app could be improved further. For example, link with online database, such as calories king and so on. Healthcare workers encouraged me to use the app, but I don't find myself beneficial from it because the database is limited.

I saw thought that this app would be Perfect for helping me to control my type 1 diabetes but it just does not contain enough info on uk foods. I therefore, cannot give a higher rating. Check out weights of anything on toast 737g not! When will you update and rectify. This is , after all, a paid for app.

Brilliant app was recommended to get it by doctor at the hospital as I'm diabetic to help me count carbs on what I eat and it's great, it also tells you the fat content, calories and protein for different portion sizes on quite a range of different foods and takeaways. Would definitely recommend

title: Calorie Counter by GetFit - Diet and Meal Planner
description:
Get a meal plan, stick to a diet, and lose weight quickly and naturally! Download a food tracker and calorie counter to stay on track of your diet and calorie intake.

MEAL PLANNING
Get many diet plans with your food habits in mind. Explore our diet list: classic diet, intermittent fasting, high-protein plan, keto, and more.

DIET RECIPES PLANS AND MACRO TRACKER
With hundreds of delicious healthy recipes adjusted to your diet plan and food preferences, you're sure to satisfy your cravings. The calories and macros are automatically calculated - take your pick and log your meal in one click!

FOOD DIARY AND LOGGING, CALORIE TRACKER
Keep track of what you eat quickly and seamlessly. With an extensive food database combined with a smart search, voice search, and barcode scanner, you'll feel the difference compared to the good-old pen & paper method.

PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCE WITH DIET PLANNER
Start with inputting measurements, set the target weight, pick a goal - and a dieting app will count the calorie budget as well as water, protein, fats, and carbs intake that will perfectly match your unique needs and lifestyle.

GET MOTIVATIONS AND GUIDE
It takes more than just the desire to reach a weight loss goal, and it can be challenging to keep going when the first burst of motivation fades away. Diet by GetFit on Android has tons of inspiration, motivation, and daily goals that will help to see progress day by day. Enjoy the expert diet coaching.

Weight loss is not about starving yourself. It's about eating smart. Set off on your journey today with a pocket nutritional coach guiding you to success!

comments: First I installed the app on the weekend Saturday -app didn't show me the list of products for a week to buy so a bit poor.It classed week from Saturday to Sunday. Then when I uninstalled the app and installed it again I put new start day from Monday 3 of August and it did show me the list but no recepies on how to prepare the meals!. Contacted support 2x with no respond !
I'd like it a lot more if I had the choice to remove the premium subscription countdown thing.
Rip off. I signed up for the free trial and R679 got taken off my account!

After checking all of the information when it got to the end where the program was ready, when I clicked, it never opened. I did it several times and it never opened so if there was a such thing as a .001 star, i would give it that
Useless app. It does not make more than free and we'll stablished apps around. Amazing how they can ask 5 dólares per week to someone.

title: Diabetic Diet Recipes
description:
Are you looking for diabetes apps to control diabetes and reduce sugar intake? Our diabetic diet app has got your back. We have curated the best diabetic recipes and exercises to help you. 

Diabetics can impact your health in many ways. However, through careful food habits and lifestyle adoptions, we can control it. You might be wondering about what to eat for diabetes? Our diabetic diet meal plan includes healthy diabetes food recipes, low carb low sugar diet, recipes for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and an integrated wellness coach. 

If you have diabetes, you should focus on eating low sugar recipes, lean meat, fiber rich food items, recipes containing good fat, less processed carbs etc. Our diabetic coach is designed with this goal. We believe that we can control diabetes by practising a strict diabetic diet and by doing diabetes workout. 

Some popular diabetic diet recipes are:- < Special diabetic breakfast recipes < Easy diabetic dinners < Diabetic friendly foods for type 1 diabetes & type 2 diabetes < Diabetic dessert recipes < Diabetic snacks < Diabetic drinks < healthy vegetarian recipes < Sugar free recipes < Recipes for diabetes during pregnancy

We have designed the diabetic coach with features like: 

1. Handpicked healthy recipes to follow a  low sugar diet. 
2. A diabetic log book with the nutritional values of foods. 
3. Daily recipe planner for diabetes. 
4. Special diabetes weight loss workouts to follow a diabetes wellness program. 
5. Exclusive diabetic diet and exercise programs to control sugar and track diabetes.
6. Track sugar intake with the integrated diabetic carb counter. 
7. Diabetes tracker to help you reduce sugar with low-intensity exercises for diabetes such as walking for diabetes. 
8. Share your favourite diabetic friendly recipes with your loved ones. 
9. Make a shopping list with a diabetic grocery list for shopping. 
10. Diabetic coach for personalized diet coaching and lifestyle management.
11. Send diabetic recipes to your friends. 
12. Get tasty diabetic recipes from around the world. 
13. Integrated diabetic log book & diabetic carb counter to track sugar intake. 
14. Workouts for diabetics, insulin control, moderate weight loss, lifestyle changes to delay and prevent diabetics. 



All our diabetes apps focus on:

+ Diabetic recipes with low sugar, healthy carbs such as fruits, vegetables, lean meat, high fiber food items to help with digestion and to control blood sugar level. 

+ Low-intensity diabetic exercise to complement the diet such as walking for diabetes and more.

+  Smart notifications to remind you to drink water, count steps and to track your mood daily. 


We also aim to include a sugar tracker to analyze your blood sugar level( glucose level) conveniently. It is easy to learn how to reduce sugar level by the inputs of a diabetes sugar tracker. 

Furthermore, we intend to update the diabetic log book with features such as mood tracking, activity tracker to keep track of your progress and more. 

Download diabetes apps to reduce diabetes. By following a healthy low sugar diet & exercise to reduce sugar we can kick-off diabetics to the curb.

comments: Good, delicious FEW recipes because when you press "more" at the end of breakfast,lunch and dinner there ARE 'NOT any "more" recipes available
I have been so concerned about my health lately. But this app really helps me to be on track. Its user friendly and gives important notifications too. Give it a try.
A nice app in which you can set your level of concern and also set goals.
An excellent app to be back to health. Good workout instructions too
Nice app for diabetic patience. It has alot of diabetics friendly recipes and weekly meal plan

title: Food Diary
description:
Food Diary is the best food journal to track what you eat everyday easily.

It is a food log to record what you eat and when, to be more conscious of your eating habits, you can use this food tracker anytime and anywhere because Food Diary is Simple to use. Just click, type what you eat, time comes up automatically/you can change it if you need to, with Food Diary you can track your diet with a few clicks

With Food Diary you can track your daily diet, log everything you eat and drink as well as keep your exercises, activities and medications with this food journal .

Food Diary Features:
- Easy and simple to use : food journal helps you adding entries easily with a few clicks.
- Backup your data easily : you can backup your food journal data also you can restore it later.
- Built-in Calendar : our Food Diary provides you a calendar to jump to any day you want to see your food tracker history or edit it.
- Easy navigation between days: if you want to see or edit your food tracker history just swipe to the right 
- Has exercice, medication, supplements, food journal : Food Diary offers you other entries types such as medication, supplements, exercise ….
- Now option : if you are exploring your food log history and you want to come back to the current day just click the small calendar icon in the top bar.
- food log Autocompletes entries to quickly enter common meals
- Share your daily food records with your friends via facebook, whatsapp, twitter or any other app easily
- Daily Reminder : Our food journal offers you a reminder to remind you at a specific time to add or update your food tracker, and you can activate or deactivate it through the settings page, also you can change the food log reminder time.
- And more features

Food Diary and your private life :

What personal information do Food Diary collects from the people that use it?
Food Diary does not collect information from the users.
When do Food Diary collects information?
Food Diary does not collect information from the users.
How do we use your information?
We do not send your information or use it at all.

Credits:
Some graphics in the food journal Icon and the graphic-art are taken from flaticon.com

Disclaimer:
Food Diary is based on an open source app, and licensed under the GNU General Public License

Download Food Diary and start living a happier and healthier life today!

Please if you like Food Diary don't forget inviting your friend to try Food Diary.

comments: This app is simple to use and to the point. The ads are also not invasive or distracting. Overall this app is A great way to keep track. However, it would be great if there was a feature to view a snapshot of what the user inputs for the week and/or month. How it is now, the user must click on each day to see what was previously input on the calendar And that is a bit annoying.

I really like this app--it's easy to use, and I love many of thr features. The only thing I don't like (and I dislike enough to not give 5 stars) is that there is no category option for "dessert," but there is a tag for "junk." I want to be able to log my after-dinner chocolate with a label that describes what it is (not a "snack" or just "food"), but the lack of option other than "junk" feels annoyingly diet culture-y and shaming. That one flaw aside, this app is very good and suits my needs

Great + easy to use. Would be nice to edit some of the categories mainly on the drink names as there is things I don't drink, such as energy drinks. Otherwise a good app, like that I can export the CSV to Google sheets and it's quick to add entries.

Simple but effective. I was looking for something in which to record the meals that I was eating so that I could be more conscious about what I was eating. I wasn't interested in counting calories but I was interested in eating less. This works perfectly, though I do wish it populated a list of my prior meals in a drop-down rather than do the incremental search that it does.

At the very beginning i thought what kind of journal doesnt keep track of days Pryor days was about to delete. I have since figured it out. Not only does it track food and water it as few other helpful things to track exercise, meds, supplements and a other other button. I will find this app to be very useful. I would have however been happy with a little tutorial.

title: Stupid Simple Macros IIFYM Tracker
description:
Welcome to the easiest diet you've ever tried. Eat whatever you want, as long as it fits with your food macro plan it's part of your diet! Stupid Simple Macros is the most efficient way ever to track your macro-nutrients and help you bulk up, lose weight, or do both at the same time!

Why count macros vs what you do on every other diet? Counting macros is one of the easiest ways to reach your fitness goals by simply tracking your fat, protein, and carb levels. Stupid Simple Macros makes tracking these macros super easy. And best of all, you set your own macros levels, so you can eat whatever you want as long as you reach your daily macros! If it fits your macros ("IIFYM") you can eat it!

Or you can customize your food grid for a Whole Foods Plant Based diet (WFPB) and see what a different it makes in your life.

FEATURES:

• Easy-to-use food icons for logging your daily macros.
• Barcode scanner with an extensive 500,000 food database for quickly adding foods.
• Take daily private before and after selfies to motivate your progress. Share them with friends when you're ready.
• Track your progress overtime and easily change your daily goals.
• Sync between devices for free.
• Food bank conserves calories for special events.
• Create custom foods and meals that will show up on your daily Food Grid.
• Set up warnings for when you approach your macros limits
• Helpful reminders for logging your daily macros.
• Change your portion sizes on the fly.
• Automatically convert to metrics with the touch of a button
• Clean layout for reviewing your daily foods and adding daily notes
• Daily water tracker
• Email your food history to anyone you'd like.

Try it today, it’s free to download! You have nothing to lose but the fat! Brought to you by the developers of Stupid Simple Keto, the popular and easy-to-use Keto diet tracker.

recentChanges: This update includes a number of bug fixes and performance improvements based on feedback from our loyal users. By popular request we've also added new lower cost purchase options that come with a free 3 day trial. As always you can still purchase a lifetime premium membership and never pay recurring fees. This update fixes some minor bugs.
comments: One month after android 11 update and the keyboard bug still exists. Keyboard does not come up trying to search. Recommendation after I gave feedback was to downgrade to android 10, really?!? Not really a solution in my books and a month is too long without an update required for compatibility. I just feel stuck as this has a lot of my journey stored here but would not recommend at this point in time.

I really like the simplistic idea behind this app, but fact like basic foods like raisins and quark are missing, and there's no food search function (you have swipe to find the right item), makes it difficult to commit to it. Even though I like the food icons and thr cute visuals, UI is way too cluttered. Finally, measurements are not always consistent in each food (eg. No gram unit available in all foods). I'd be happy to try this app on it's next iterations to see if they fixed these points.

I had given this 5 stars. I even paid for the premium version in 2017. But then there was an update, and the premium version stopped. The ads have returned and the app lost some functionality. I'm not going to keep paying for new premium versions after every update.
Great free version that is a good guide to tracking your macros. Not an exact measurement but close enough to be very useful.

Great app! Takes a bit to figure out how to navigate thru it, but that's the way it is with all apps. I'm not doing keto, but still tracking my macros. I have lost 5 lbs (maybe some water weight, but i have increased my H2O intake) in a week because I am aware of what I am eating, thanks to this app. Well worth the $25.

title: Calorie Counter & Meal Planner With Health Fitness
description:
Want to Lose Weight, Stay fit, Feel Healthy or Stay Safe? It is not rocket science.  Whether you want to lose weight, get fit, change your habits, or start a new diet you're all protected by Calorie Counter.

Over 100 million pounds and 88% of those who observe Calorie counter
losses for at least seven days have been lost by our current members.

Join FREE today and continue to live a safer, healthy life! See for yourself why the Calorie counter is the People's most popular health and fitness app.

✔️ Track Your Food on Daily Routine -
⦿ Massive Food Database --> 13+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines.
⦿ Barcode Scanner --> Simply scan barcodes to Calorie and foods. 5+ million barcodes recognized.
⦿ Recipies --> Over 500+ recipes with nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
⦿ Manual Restaurant Entry --> Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
⦿ Insight of Daily Food --> Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat.
⦿ Personalized Calorie Input --> Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites.
⦿ Calorie Counter --> We automatically calorie counting in your foods, meals, and recipes.
⦿ Calorie Macro Tracker --> We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals, and recipes.
⦿ Track Nutrients --> Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
⦿ Exercises Tracker --> Regularly Exercises for everyone according to their Choices.

✔️ Your Achievements Via Setting your Goals
⦿ Choose A Goal --> We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.
⦿ Goal Setting --> Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie, keto diet, healthy eating
high protein diet, ideal weight, liquid diet, lose weight, low carb diet, low-fat diet, and macros goals.
⦿ Change Habits --> It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.
⦿ Enter Entries and Create Collage and Show to the world how Calorie Counter helps you to Lose Weight, Gain weight or Stay Fit.

✔️ Exercises that make you Fit and Healthy
⦿ 450+ Exercises --> Choose  Or create your own exercises and workouts.
⦿ Cardio Exercises --> Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates, and more.
⦿ Power Strength Exercises --> Including sets, reps, and weight per set.
⦿ With Equipment Exercises or Without Equipment Exercises.

✔️ Live your Perfect Life Dream and Share
⦿ Your Calorie Progress  --> Stay motivated with a graph of how you’re improving over time.
⦿ Growth Photos --> Add photos in Collage to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress.
⦿ Calorie Nutrition Reports --> View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake.
⦿ Share Your Progress --> Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

✔️ Download Calorie Counter and start living a better and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit:
Privacy Policy: https://giantbrainsllc.wordpress.com/privacy-policy/
Support: https://giantbrainsllc.wordpress.com/contact/
Terms and Condition: https://giantbrainsllc.wordpress.com/terms-of-use/

title: Stupid Simple Paleo Diet Tracking & Guide
description:
Lose weight, gain muscle, and feel empowered about your food choices with Stupid Simple Paleo, the easiest-to-use calories and macros counter for people on the Paleo Diet.

Why eat as the cavemen did? The Paleo Diet emphasizes a return to our natural state with a diet rich with high fiber, unprocessed foods, locally grown produce, and quality antibiotic-free, organic meats. You’ll feel great losing weight and you’ll feel confident about consuming only natural foods.  

FEATURES:
• Easy-to-use food icons for logging your daily Paleo foods.
• Full of Paleo ingredients to inspire creative cooking.
• Barcode scanner that let's you scan food to record it.
• Track your progress over time and set daily goals.
• Sync between devices for free.
• Food bank conserves calories for special events.
• Add custom foods.
• Helpful warnings when you approach your daily carb/fat/protein limit.
• Change portion sizes on the fly.
• Easily review your daily foods.
• Helps you learn new habits, eat right, and ultimately keep the weight off. 
• Track your glasses of water each day

Are you ready for a healthy start? Try it out today - it’s free! You have nothing to lose but the fat.
 
*Brought to you by the developer of Stupid Simple Keto.

summary: The easiest way to track foods on the Caveman Diet, lose weight, be healthy!
recentChanges: Welcome to the all new Stupid Simple Paleo version 6! We've redesigned the app from the ground up, making it faster, more reliable, and easier to use. You can now share your progress and foods with friends and family too. The piggy bank is now a rolling 30 day bank that updates dynamically when you add/remove food in the past OR resets at the beginning of each month. The choice is yours! This minor update fixes an incompatibility with our Macros app.
comments: Great little app that does exactly what it says it does. Easy interface with awesome icons and graphics. It does need calorie expenditure for workouts though. Or at least I haven't found it yet. Still worth every cent for the add free version.

Just amazing! Tried a few apps but this one beats them all. Truly thank the developers. Gives you full control of the breakdown of your diet (% macros) and a tailored goal. Once you add items it automatically deducts from your daily goal so you can plan ahead. Stupid simple indeed. Tip my hat to you guys

Great app. It makes it easy to keep track of what you are eating with barcode scanning and quickly searchable lists of foods. You can carry your own recipes easily and then add them to your day while changing portion size on the fly. It is simple to set the macro balances that you want as well. The only real improvement would be that it would be nice to be able to access a report of your micronutrients as well. Although that isn't as important as easy access to your macro's.

once I figured out how to use the app, it has been amazing. I wish there were step by step directions on what each thing is and how to use it, such as the calorie bank. I was able to find the answer on Google. there is probably still more to this app that I am not aware of. the next question on this asks if we can import recipes. I'm not aware of being able to do that but I will definitely be asking Google

App is basically useless unless you buy the premium version. None of the features work in the "free" version and every time you attempt to use one you're simply prompted with an "upgrade to premium" ad. Don't waste your time downloading this.

title: Keto Diet App Free Guide: Low Carb Diet Nutrition
description:
The ketogenic diet plan (or keto diet plan, for short) is a low-carb, high-fat diet that supplies lots of health advantages.
In fact, over 20 researches reveal that this sort of diet plan can help you lose weight as well as improve your health.
Possible healing usages for the keto diet have actually been examined for numerous extra neurological disorders, a few of which include: Alzheimer's condition, amyotrophic side sclerosis, migraine, neurotrauma, discomfort, Parkinson's disease, and also rest problems. Keto diet plan may even have advantages versus diabetes mellitus, cancer, epilepsy and more.

In this keto diet free app and guide you will find out more about the keto diet, what you should and shouldn’t eat, what are the keto diet low carb benefits and risks, why is it good, why is it different from atkins low carb diet, and more.

Download now and learn!


What Is a Keto Diet plan?
Although keto diet became recently very popular it is know for a while now, and in many ways it resembles to the Atkins diet – also a low carb diet that used mainly for weight loss.
It involves drastically decreasing carbohydrate consumption and also replacing it with fat. This reduction in carbohydrates places your body right into a metabolic state called ketosis.
When this happens, your body ends up being exceptionally effective at shedding fat for energy. It likewise transforms fat into ketones in the liver, which can supply power for the mind
Ketogenic diets can trigger massive reductions in blood glucose and also insulin degrees. This, together with the enhanced ketones, has numerous health advantages that you can read of, in this keto diet app free guide.

Keto foods and keto recipes will be found also in the app, good verity of tasty low carb keto recipes and keto dishes can really make the difference between failure and success of our ketodiet.

Various Types of Keto Diet Regimens
There are a number of variations of the keto diet plans, consisting of:
- Basic keto diet (standard keto diet - SKD): This is an extremely low-carb, moderate-protein as well as high-fat diet regimen. It generally contains 75% fat, 20% protein and only 5% carbs (1Trusted Source).
- Cyclical keto diet regimen (CKD): This diet plan includes durations of higher-carb refeeds, such as 5 ketogenic days adhered to by 2 high-carb days.
- Targeted keto diet plan (TKD): This diet regimen enables you to include carbs around workouts.
- High-protein keto diet plan: This is similar to a basic ketogenic diet regimen, but consists of a lot more healthy protein. The proportion is often 60% fat, 35% protein and also 5% carbohydrates.
Nonetheless, only the typical and high-protein ketogenic diet plans have been examined extensively. Cyclical or targeted ketogenic diets are advanced techniques and also primarily used by body builders or professional athletes. 

Ketosis is a metabolic state characterized by elevated levels of ketone bodies in the blood or urine. Physiologic ketosis is a normal response to low glucose availability, such as low-carbohydrate diets or fasting, that provides an additional energy source for the brain in the form of ketones. Download now this great keto diet app and learn more!

Download now and learn all about keto diet!

title: Fastic: Fasting App & Intermittent Fasting Tracker
description:
The Fastic App – One of the most popular Intermittent Fasting Apps

If you’re interested in fat loss, muscle gain or better health, you too can benefit from the holistic lifestyle that is intermittent fasting. We’ve got everything to help you on your way to a healthier life – from a Step Counter, Water Tracker, Fasting Timer and Body Status, to Healthy Recipes and Daily Tips. Follow popular fasting plans for men and women, such as the 16:8 window or the Keto diet and become a Fasting Pro quickly and easily. Start now and download the Fastic intermittent fasting app for free!

• Reach your goals sustainably with IF

• Nobel Prize-Winning Intermittent Fasting

🚀 Long-Term Benefits

Intermittent fasting entails a shift in eating habits. It is not suitable for pregnant/nursing women, children under 18 years of age or persons with diagnosed eating disorders. www.fastic.com/en/disclaimer

recentChanges:
In this update, we have worked on small improvements and some graphics in the app.
We’ve also optimized the loading time so that you can spend more time enjoying Fastic.
Thanks for being a part of the Fastic family!
comments: I am using the paid version and I love it! I love the reminders and the lessons. I especially love the recipes and the fact that you have a TON of vegetarian options. The only reason I rated it 4 stars is that recipes get removed! I plan my meals a week in advance and I went today to prepare one and the 3 of the recipes are gone! There also isn't an option to download a .pdf to save for later. Please fix this and i will rate 5 stars!

Great app. I've experimented with IF in the past, with great success. However, with COVID and working from home, it's a lot easier to slip up and eat whenever you want to. This app pops up periodically reminding me that I need to drink water. It's nice to have a reminder, which should prevent me from mindlessly eating when I'm not scheduled to. My first foray into IF was about 2 years ago, and I lost 85lbs in total. I'm not quite where I was before, but I'm still dealing with about 50 extra lbs. This app is highly recommended, as long as you use it as intended.

Great app, takes a little learning. I was initially confused by the words encouraging me to 'End Fasting' when I was only hours into current fast. This resulted in a few badly timed fast records, but the ability to edit fasting start and end times saved me. I often forget to record my water intake, despite the much appreciated reminders from the app. The retroactive edit ability for water intake does not allow me to click on a day and edit. No response when I try to select a day's water record.

Easy and Convenient app. I love that I can see my progress so easily!! I wish I could connect to my community though. It disappeared as quickly as it appeared???? I also wish I could communicate with my fasting buddies, at minimum send them an emoji or something. I use the paid version so I'm not sure what I'm getting that's any different than the free version... I don't use the recipes or the tools, I just use the trackers. All in all I'm happy I have the app though to stay on track.

Love this app. I'm using the free version. There are enough features to get you started on IF. You enter basic info about yourself & they suggest a plan. You can modify the IF hours. Cool feature shows start/stop times. During fast you can see at a glance how long you've fasted/and time left. Reminders to drink water w/place to log amount. Didn't rate 5 stars because I wear an off brand fitness tracker (not listed on app) so steps are not recorded & no way to manually enter steps taken.

title: Carbon - Smart Diet Coach
description:
Carbon Diet Coach is your solution for results that LAST. Whether your goal is to lose fat, build muscle, improve your metabolism, or simply maintain your weight, Carbon Diet Coach removes the guesswork.

Carbon Diet Coach is a science-based nutrition app designed by renowned nutrition coaches Dr. Layne Norton (Ph.D. Nutritional Sciences), Holly Baxter (MS Dietetics), and Registered Dietitian Keith Kraker (BS Dietetics).

It does everything a normal nutrition coach would but at a fraction of the cost. Simply select your goal, answer a few short questions, and it does the rest! You will get a customized nutrition plan based on YOUR goals and metabolism.

What's more, Carbon will adjust the plan as you progress to optimize your results. If you hit a plateau or stall, Carbon will make adjustments to keep you progressing towards your goal, just like any good coach would. Our coaching system uses the latest techniques in nutrition science to make sure you get the best results possible.

All you need to do is follow these simple steps:

• Log your food using the built-in food tracker
• Log your body weight
• Check-in each week

Do that and Carbon does the rest!

Carbon Diet Coach can do things other nutrition coaching apps can’t do. For example, your nutrition plan can be tailored to your diet preference:

• Balanced
• Low Carb
• Low Fat
• Ketogenic
• Plant-Based

Each setting is completely customizable so that you receive a plan that is sustainable for YOU!

Another feature that makes Carbon unique is the diet planner. Want high and low-calorie days rather than eating the same foods every day? Use the diet planner to set up your week and stay on track. Overate on one day and not sure what to do with your nutrition plan for the rest of the week? Adjust the diet planner to account for what you overate and Carbon does the rest!

Other coaching features include:

• Adjustable check-in days
• Check-in explanations so you're never left wondering why the app did or didn’t make a change
• Check-in history so you can look back and see why the app made various adjustments
• Charts showing your weight, body fat, lean body mass, calorie intake, protein intake, carbohydrate intake, fat intake, and metabolic rate
• Early check-in feature for those who can’t always check in on their specified day
• Goal tracker so you can see the progress you’ve made and how close you are to your goal
• Recommendations after you reach a goal so you can plan for what's next and KEEP your results

Already know what you are doing with nutrition and don’t need Carbon to coach you? No problem, you can enter your nutrition targets and simply use the food tracker. Beyond the amazing coaching features of this app is a food tracker that's excellent in its own right. Its features include:

• A huge food database
• Barcode scanner
• Quick add macros
• Copy meals
• Favorite foods
• Create custom foods
• Create custom recipes

No matter what your goal is, Carbon Diet Coach is your solution.

Simple. Scientific. Sustainable.

descriptionHTML:
Carbon Diet Coach is your solution for results that LAST. Whether your goal is to lose fat, build muscle, improve your metabolism, or simply maintain your weight, Carbon Diet Coach removes the guesswork.

Carbon Diet Coach is a science-based nutrition app designed by renowned nutrition coaches Dr. Layne Norton (Ph.D. Nutritional Sciences), Holly Baxter (MS Dietetics), and Registered Dietitian Keith Kraker (BS Dietetics).

It does everything a normal nutrition coach would but at a fraction of the cost. Simply select your goal, answer a few short questions, and it does the rest! You will get a customized nutrition plan based on YOUR goals and metabolism.

What's more, Carbon will adjust the plan as you progress to optimize your results. If you hit a plateau or stall, Carbon will make adjustments to keep you progressing towards your goal, just like any good coach would. Our coaching system uses the latest techniques in nutrition science to make sure you get the best results possible.

All you need to do is follow these simple steps:

• Log your food using the built-in food tracker
• Log your body weight
• Check-in each week

Do that and Carbon does the rest!

Carbon Diet Coach can do things other nutrition coaching apps can’t do. For example, your nutrition plan can be tailored to your diet preference:

• Balanced
• Low Carb
• Low Fat
• Ketogenic
• Plant-Based

Each setting is completely customizable so that you receive a plan that is sustainable for YOU!

Another feature that makes Carbon unique is the diet planner. Want high and low-calorie days rather than eating the same foods every day? Use the diet planner to set up your week and stay on track. Overate on one day and not sure what to do with your nutrition plan for the rest of the week? Adjust the diet planner to account for what you overate and Carbon does the rest!

Other coaching features include:

• Adjustable check-in days
• Check-in explanations so you're never left wondering why the app did or didn’t make a change
• Check-in history so you can look back and see why the app made various adjustments
• Charts showing your weight, body fat, lean body mass, calorie intake, protein intake, carbohydrate intake, fat intake, and metabolic rate
• Early check-in feature for those who can’t always check in on their specified day
• Goal tracker so you can see the progress you’ve made and how close you are to your goal
• Recommendations after you reach a goal so you can plan for what's next and KEEP your results

Already know what you are doing with nutrition and don’t need Carbon to coach you? No problem, you can enter your nutrition targets and simply use the food tracker. Beyond the amazing coaching features of this app is a food tracker that's excellent in its own right. Its features include:

• A huge food database
• Barcode scanner
• Quick add macros
• Copy meals
• Favorite foods
• Create custom foods
• Create custom recipes

No matter what your goal is, Carbon Diet Coach is your solution.

Simple. Scientific. Sustainable.

https://fatsecret.com

comments: The app is currently not working. I just purchased a subscription and as soon as i go to create goal i get stuck on the weight field. As soon as i put in the text (kg -> 105) the app gets stuck and crashes within seconds. I then need to log in again and start all over. Also you have to choose the birthyear from an interface which forces you to manually skip from month through month starting at jan. 1984 until you make it to your birth year. Thats very inconvenient.

I was aware that there was no German food database, which is fine by me, but even after entering items that failed bar code scanning manually they still won't be detected by scanning the bar code afterwards. If you have no idea how to setup your calories and macros, the app is useful. For tracking food (outside of the US I guess), not so much.

Amazing, worth 5 times what you pay. Can't say enough good things. I've been counting macros for over a year, had carbon now for a month or two and my results have gone through the roof. You're getting a macro coach (and a really great one at that) for practically nothing. If you put in your food accurately I have no doubt any one would have less than amazing results.

Really annoting data entry issues. 1) when swapping to other apps like a notepad, picture of your scaled food, or spreadsheet, it dumps all of your work and the app restarts. It doesn't save it untill the end. It doesnt hold its place in the background. So it doesnt utilise cache data effectivly like it could. 2) When scanning something it doesnt appear on your most recent. I'm not sure if you have the option to add it to your my foods list.

I love the functionality of the app and how it is all set up. However, how can you put a product out in the market, charge top dollar and out of 10 products I scan, all of them have the wrong nutritional information?!?! Dr.Layne and team, please fix this, it is annoying and frustrating. Get a better database to pull the info from.

title: DWP - Diet and Workout Plan
description:
DWP - Diet and Workout Plan - the name says it all. These are the main factors you need to consider whether you want to lose weight or gain some muscle.

How can we help you reach your fitness goals?
By offering an app that contains a diet plan, a macro calculator, a calorie counter, lots of healthy recipes, both local and international and last, but not least, custom made workout plans, some of them no gym required,  all in one convenient place.

● Know what you eat
Lose weight with a personalized diet plan. Using our app, you can find out exactly how many grams of protein, carbohydrates and fats you are consuming, every day.

●Healthy recipes for all tastes.
Choose from over 80 international or local recipes, and create a menu that fits you perfectly. Don't worry, we also added a few cheat meals just so you spice things up once in awhile.

● MONITOR YOUR DAILY WATER CONSUMPTION
With our Professional Water Tracker, you can find out how much water is recommended for your daily consumption, you can monitor how much water you drink, you can receive notifications to drink water as well as tips or curiosities about water and other fluids beneficial to the body.

●Choose your recipes and go shopping
Using our Meal Planning Mode, you can easily add the recipes you want to cook, to your in-app cart, and create a grocery list with the exact amounts and ingredients you need.

●No extra trips to the grocery store!
Our Meal Planning Mode allows you to plan your meals ahead. Select the recipes you would like to cook for the next few days, and buy all the ingredients in one trip.

●Personalised workout plans
Want to gain or lose weight? We got you covered with custom made workout plans.

●You don't have time to go to the gym?
No problem! We have created workout plans that can be used both at the gym and at home, with no gym equipment necessary.

●Feed your curiosity
Find out cool stuff, facts and information about your body and ways you can enhance weight-loss or weight-gain.

Diet and Workout Plan app also promotes healthy foods with high level of sirtuin. Sirtuin is a protein that helps antiaging processes, gives energy boosts  and more health benefits. Sirtuin foods examples are dark chocolate, berries, extra virgin olive oil and  walnuts. Diet and Workout Plan App offers recipes that contain these high sirtuin foods and many other benefits.


Download Diet and Workout Plan now and improve your health and lifestyle today! We will do our best to help you stay focused and motivated while working towards your weight loss goals.

title: Diabetic Recipes
description:
Diabetic recipes free application which includes over 100 meals. Do you know about diabetes? It is a common metabolic disorder that affect to lot of people all around the world. High blood sugar levels must be checked and so meals are really important. High sugar content meals are not appropiate for people who suffer this illness, neither a high consumption of high carbs food.

There are many diabetic recipes, they could be cooked almost in infinite ways. This APP shows many foods to prevent diabetes and high sugar in blood, same ingredients could be cooked in many ways and this free application shows you how. The access to more than 100 meals is completely free, enjoy best healthy and low carbs meals. This application is also suitable for people that are on a diet, people that want to loss some fat or just for people that want to eat healthy and tasty meals. Remember that physical activity is very important to be healthy.

Diabetic recipes APP includes different types of food, such as meat, fish, salads and vegetables, soups, sugar free desserts and much more. In addition, there are different types of low carb meals, gluten-free and more. All of them are included to let you cooking them in a really easy way. There are many soups and creams included, so you can use them to prepare your custom meals.

In this application you will find more than 100 recipes organized into multiple categories:
★ Fish elaborations
★ Meat meals
★ Vegetables and salads
★ Low carb food
★ Sugar free desserts
★ Soups
★ Creams

★ Navigate through over 100 diabetic meals with high quality images and step by step elaboration process
★ Create your own favorite recipe list just with one click
★ All meals are classified in different categories
★ Share each elaboration with your family and friends
★ Mark the ingredients you have already used with a single click
★ Really straightforward recipes

Example of some meals:

★ Baked squic

★ Eggplant and cauliflower
★ Free sugar desserts as cakes and cupcakes
★ Many ways to cook hight proteing and low carb food as chicked or fish

title: Hol: Weight Loss Calorie Counter Nutrition Tracker
description:
Colorful way to lose weight!

Features:
✓ Calorie counter with over 240K foods and barcode scanner
✓ Exercise logger with 800 different exercise types 
✓ Foods classified by color (calorie density), encouraging healthy eating without feeling hungry and high nutrition
✓ Auto-exercise tracker using low power sensors, detects walking, biking and running without draining battery
✓ Weight logging and weight graph projection to your target weight
✓ Calorie budget for your age, height, gender, activity and weight
✓ Saved Meals
✓ Pro: Browse or search 2+ million recipes with fast easy logging

What is Hol?

Hol is a calorie counter and sustainable weight loss plan. Each food in Hol has a color (greens, yellows, and reds). Eating more greens will keep you full and more likely to eat less calories. Over time, this results in weight loss, with less effort.

What do the colors mean?

Hol Colors (greens, yellows, and reds) indicates the calorie density of the food (with green being lower).

Green foods have more fiber and water, giving them less calories while keeping you full. Eating green foods is also healthy eating: fruits, vegetables, salad greens, and other foods packed with nutrients. These foods keep you full, with less calories!

How do I find green foods I like?

You can try our food search and barcode scanner to find green foods you like. Add them as saved meals for quicker access!

Hol Pro also includes recipes! Lots of recipes can secretly be red (high calorie density). Hol recipes are color labeled, making sure you are more full with less calories, for easier weight loss.

What happens when you've filled your calorie budget, but you're still hungry?

Have you ever tracked your calories but ended up feeling hungry? When you limit calories, you might think you have to eat less food. But what if you could eat different foods, ones that have more fiber, water, and nutrients? That’s what happens when you eat green foods! You’ll get to keep eating, you’ll be getting more fiber, water and nutrients, and less calories, for easier weight loss. It’s more than a calorie counter!

Can I actually lose weight without being hungry?

All weight loss diets work if you eat less calories. Fasting restricts calories by time. Keto eliminates carbs, which could be a big source of calories. But you want sustainable weight loss - where you feel satisfied (come on, we all love carbs, and who wants to skip meals and be hungry!). With Hol, you eat foods that make you more full physically, by having more fiber and water (they tend to have lots of nutrients too!). So you get to keep eating (now eating healthy), and you’ll lose weight - and you’ll get healthy fiber, water and nutrients too!

What about non-green foods?

Yellow and red foods can still have lots of nutrition, and don’t need to be avoided! But if you find you’re running out of calories too soon in the day, and you feel hungry, you should add more green foods. They’ll allow you to eat more, fill you up without filling up your calorie budget and sabotaging your weight loss.

Are all green foods nutritious?

Lots of them are! Most green foods are whole foods (sound familiar?). When food is processed it’s either for economic reasons, or to make it tastier, which usually means removing fiber and water and adding sugar and more calories without adding nutrition. By tracking calorie density, you can identify foods that tend to be less processed, having more fiber and better nutrition. 


Give it a try!

The barcode scanner doesn't work. I paid the two dollars to get recipes and the recipe bank has only five or six vegetarian recipes, almost all drinks. I can't input foods they don't already have in their database.

Love this app!! Have used others and this one works. Makes you rethink how you view your food and food choices. Food log is easy to use. Makes finding right foods, right portions and brands easy so you do it. Colour coded foods help you make better choices every day. Set personalized goals to lose weight, gain weight or stay the same then log, track progress and see results. Awesome app!!
One of the only calorie density apps out there besides Noom, for which I'm grateful. Very basic. Wish I could edit my "meals". Otherwise pretty solid app.

title: Meal planner - healthy food, diets for weight loss
description:
Meet your personal guide to proper nutrition, weight loss without diets, and breakdowns!! We will tell and teach you how to eat properly during daily fitness training. Experience real results by following our nutritional program. Discover a food diary and improve your quality of life. Improve overall health and well-being by switching to proper and fractional nutrition. Food plan, recipes and tips for losing weight. Losing weight with us is delicious and healthy! Check it yourself! :)

In addition to a fitness diet for weight loss, you will have access to such functions as:
• Personal weight tracker - keep track of your weight changes as you follow a fitness weight loss program
• Meal Reminders - Diet Meals - Set a time for each meal and stick to your routine. Consistency and regime are the main rule. Meals should not be skipped.
• Water intake tracker - water consumption. If you want to lose weight and just improve your well-being, you need to consume enough water every day, each has its own rate, we will tell you more about this in the app.
• Calorie counter - counting calories in foods - carbs, fat, and protein counter.
• Step tracker - pedometer - movement is an integral part of the program. You have to move. Take a walk, walk to work, or take the escalator up.
• Departments: recommendations for losing weight, basic rules for a 30-day diet.

Simple and quick meals!
Forget grueling diets! Useful fitness recipes for every day!
Remember: nutrition is a very important part of a healthy lifestyle. Make a little effort in this direction - and soon you will get used to this mode and it will bring a lot of bonuses into your life! Calorie counting in foods. Carbs, fat, and protein counter in breakfast, lunch and dinner. Calorie counting in snacks! Yes, you need to take a little time and develop a habit, but it's definitely worth it. No aggressive diets, just proper and good nutrition, drink enough water every day, good sleep has not been canceled either! And the result will not be long in coming. Perfect figure in 30 days. The right way to beauty and health is proper nutrition!

It's easy to reach your goal!
With the help of our meal planner, with simple and healthy recipes, following all the rules, controlling your eating habits, you can achieve the desired result in a month. Balanced, fractional meals: Breakfast, first snack, lunch, second snack, dinner. Recipes with photos. It is necessary to consume food on a schedule, at the same time. You cannot ignore the morning meal, as well as dinner, forget about the myth that you cannot eat after 18:00, the main thing is not to eat three hours before bed! The rules are simple, and a food diary will help you avoid missing or confusing anything! You should also have a snack between meals.

Rules to be followed:
1. Get rid of salt as it retains water in the body. And these are additional numbers on the display of the scale!
2. Try not to use store sauces. They are high in calories and full of artificial additives. The same goes for food, ideally you should choose high-quality and fresh produce from proven farmers markets.
3. Drink green tea, fruit and vegetable juices. Also, do not drink alcohol, it is high in calories and can help whet your appetite.

Balance!
The main thing is to maintain the balance of (proteins, fats, carbohydrates). Meals should be varied. You should not completely give up lipids and carbons, for example, as this can cause serious illness. All the dishes in our nutrition diary for weight loss program are not only healthy, but also delicious. Make a shopping list before going to the store. We offer you simple recipes that you can really enjoy, and thanks to the taste, you will not feel imprisoned by the diet. Healthy food without limits! You don't have to starve! Share the app with your friends and start a healthy life together. Privacy Policy Updated

title: SlimFast Together
description:
Start your weight loss* journey with SlimFast and a FREE tracking tool – the SlimFast Together App. Choose from two flexible plans to suit your needs and preferences: Keto and Favorite Foods. Each with easy-to-use features to: 

Create customized daily meal plans
Log your weight and meals with progress tracker
Track exercise activity and water consumption
Access a variety of tasty recipes that fit your plan
Browse the full range of SlimFast products and easily add to your shopping list 
Automatically populate your shopping cart for pick-up or delivery from your favorite online retailer
Access the SlimFast library of blogs with articles and tips 
Receive reminders to keep you on track 
Add ingredients to meal plans using the convenient UPC scanner 
Snap and upload progress photos to document your journey

The SlimFast Together App is here to help you stay motivated and successful! The meal planner is simple and convenient, and the weight loss tracker helps you to celebrate victories big and small.

It’s easy to get started…just download the app, sign up, pick a start date, follow The Plan and reach your goals! Following the clinically proven SlimFast Plan is as easy as 1 - 2 - 3. Enjoy one sensible meal of your choice, replace any two daily meals with SlimFast shakes, smoothies or bars and enjoy three low-calorie snacks between meals.

Favorite Foods: 
Choose the SlimFast Favorite Foods Plan to lose weight your way (and keep it off). You have the freedom to indulge in all your favorite foods and to choose the products that are right for you, including SlimFast Original, Advanced Nutrition, Advanced Energy, Keto and Diabetic Weight Loss. You might choose a refreshing SlimFast smoothie for breakfast and a decadent SlimFast meal bar for lunch. In between meals, satisfy cravings with SlimFast snacks or any low-calorie snack of your choice. At dinner, indulge in dishes like bacon asparagus pasta, steak tacos or margherita pizza. 
Search and select ingredients, SlimFast recipes and SlimFast products from our database, or use the convenient UPC scanner. Track your daily food intake to ensure you follow a reduced calorie weight-loss plan. 
Unique Favorite Foods Features: 
Create customizable daily meal plans utilizing recipes, ingredients, and products from our database 
Track your daily calorie intake 
Choose from a variety of SlimFast product lines and your favorite recipes 

Keto: 
Choose the SlimFast Keto Plan for easy-to-follow, pre-defined daily meal plans. Modify existing menus to suit your preferences or create a fully customized meal plan with just a few clicks. The built-in, Keto macro calculator will automatically adjust as you customize your meal plan to ensure you stay on track. The SlimFast Keto Plan supports a low-carb, high fat, moderate protein-based Keto diet.

Search and select ingredients, SlimFast Keto recipes and SlimFast Keto products from our database or use the UPC scanner to easily customize your meal plans. 

Unique Keto Features: 

Create Keto-friendly daily meal plans, designed exclusively by a Registered Dietitian to meet ketogenic diet macros
Add or remove ingredients or products to customize selected meal plans
Create your own completely customized meal plans
Search and select ingredients, Keto recipes and SlimFast Keto products from our database
Enjoy the ease of the macro-calculator that quickly computes daily net carbs, fat, calories, and protein

Whether you choose the Keto or Favorite Foods Plan, SlimFast will help you lose the weight and keep it off. Finally, there’s a weight loss plan that gives you the freedom to choose your own path. Start today and see results in just one week
*Based on the SlimFast Plan (a reduced-calorie diet, regular exercise, and plenty of fluids). Individual results may vary. Average weight loss is 1-2 pounds per week. Read label prior to use. Check with your doctor if nursing, pregnant, under 18, or following a doctor prescribed diet.

title: Diabetic Calculator
description:
Diabetes, particularly type 1, is a very serious illness, restricting freedom of  the way you eat. To give some more freedom in choice of meals, diabeticians teach patients to calculate their carbohydrates intake in their food, which in turn, together with current glucose level, can optimize amount of insulin they should inject. But, off-course you have to read nutrition labels, weigh your meals and do some maths. Because my wife has fallen sick with type 1 diabetes, after visits to diabetic educators, I decided to write for her simple program where she can create database of foods she eats, and which will do carbohydrates counting for her. I used desktop database application and put it on her laptop.After about 3 years of her using software religiously before every meal, somebody asked me if I could write application version of program for  smartphone. This applications does not create fancy reports, sends emails to your doctor, reads world foods database or scans bar codes on packaging. My wife doesn't need it. Her  glucose meter and its software takes care of all diabetic statistics, and it's not big deal to send email with reports it creates to her doctor, she does it every fortnight. She wants to create database of carbohydrates content of foods she actually eats, either ready food or self-prepared meals. Use it to compile her meal and let application to calculate carbohydrates content. Then measure glucose level and get suggested insulin dose based on her meal carbo content and blood glucose level.
Too complex apps only create confusion, especially among older people.

title: Weight Loss Recipes
description:
Weight loss recipes contain a variety of dishes that helps you to lose weight and keep it off. Skipping meals is not a good idea. To lose weight you have to reduce the number of calories you consume and increase the calories you burn through exercise. Our app helps you to find healthy, delicious weight-loss and diet recipes including breakfasts, lunches, and dinners.

Workout and Diet plays an important role in losing weight. Our app has a wide variety of diet and weight loss recipes to choose from with nutritional information. You can find all sorts of diet, weight loss and sugar-free recipes from soups to main courses.

Keep up with your workouts and we give you the perfect recipes to achieve a healthy and fit body.

OUR APP EXPERIENCE

Weight loss recipes app is simple to navigate and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you’re cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your weight watchers cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for your Weight Watchers Grocery

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won’t miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.
It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Weight Loss Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find fitness foods you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favourite Low-Calorie Dish

Use our bookmark button to save and organize your recipes in your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful Weight Watcher recipe that you’d like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder for your Daily Routine

Recipe Finder can help you find a good cuisine based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Weight Loss app today. Happy Cooking!

title: Keto Diet : Low Carb Recipes for Weight Loss
description:
The ketogenic diet or keto diet is a high-fat, adequate-protein, low-carbohydrate diet that in medicine is used mainly to treat hard-to-control (refractory) epilepsy in children. The diet forces the body to burn fats rather than carbohydrates. In short ketogenic is a term for a low-carb diet.
In this keto app you can browse the best mouthwatering Keto recipes from appetizers, main dishes, soups, to any other high fat dishes! We got you covered for all your Keto cravings. The classic ketogenic diet contains a 4:1 ratio by weight of fat to combined protein and carbohydrate. This is achieved by excluding high-carbohydrate foods such as starchy fruits and vegetables, bread, pasta, grains, and sugar while increasing the consumption of foods high in fat such as nuts, cream, and butter. We have a big collection of the best low-carb breakfast, dinner, and side dish recipes that are higher in fat than protein, which can help you follow a keto diet plan. You can find thousands of delicious recipes for keto bread, pizza, bacon and eggs, hamburger patties, cheese keto frittata, chicken lettuce wraps and many more that will make sticking to your ketogenic diet. Almost all recipes are easy to prepare.

People choosing a diet for health conditions should have their diet tailored to their requirements. The keto diet aims to force your body into using a different type of fuel. Eating out on the keto diet isn't easy, but this app makes it so! Find a complete list of keto fast-food ingredients to help you build a keto meal. Turn your fats into fuel while eating the food you love. Fish and shellfish are very keto-friendly foods. Keto diet has become one of the most popular methods worldwide to shed excess weight and improve health. Fats should replace the majority of cut carbs and deliver approximately 75% of your total calorie intake. Switching over to a ketogenic diet can seem overwhelming, but it doesn’t have to be difficult. To reach and remain in a state of ketosis, carbs must be restricted. 

Download and make a keto diet plan now!
descriptionHTML:
The ketogenic diet or keto diet is a high-fat, adequate-protein, low-carbohydrate diet that in medicine is used mainly to treat hard-to-control (refractory) epilepsy in children. The diet forces the body to burn fats rather than carbohydrates. In short ketogenic is a term for a low-carb diet.
In this keto app you can browse the best mouthwatering Keto recipes from appetizers, main dishes, soups, to any other high fat dishes! We got you covered for all your Keto cravings. The classic ketogenic diet contains a 4:1 ratio by weight of fat to combined protein and carbohydrate. This is achieved by excluding high-carbohydrate foods such as starchy fruits and vegetables, bread, pasta, grains, and sugar while increasing the consumption of foods high in fat such as nuts, cream, and butter. We have a big collection of the best low-carb breakfast, dinner, and side dish recipes that are higher in fat than protein, which can help you follow a keto diet plan. You can find thousands of delicious recipes for keto bread, pizza, bacon and eggs, hamburger patties, cheese keto frittata, chicken lettuce wraps and many more that will make sticking to your ketogenic diet. Almost all recipes are easy to prepare.

People choosing a diet for health conditions should have their diet tailored to their requirements. The keto diet aims to force your body into using a different type of fuel. Eating out on the keto diet isn't easy, but this app makes it so! Find a complete list of keto fast-food ingredients to help you build a keto meal. Turn your fats into fuel while eating the food you love. Fish and shellfish are very keto-friendly foods. Keto diet has become one of the most popular methods worldwide to shed excess weight and improve health. Fats should replace the majority of cut carbs and deliver approximately 75% of your total calorie intake. Switching over to a ketogenic diet can seem overwhelming, but it doesn’t have to be difficult. To reach and remain in a state of ketosis, carbs must be restricted.

Download and make a keto diet plan now!

The included recipes are perfect for the keto diet, low carb diet, Atkins diet, Paleo diet, and any ketogenic diet.

This keto diet program app will help you to achieve weight loss and improve your health. It is perfect for a beginner because it teaches you fundamental cooking tecniques of the keto diet plan. If you are interested in the Atkins Diet recipes or Paleo diet recipes, then this app might be perfect for you as well since the macronutrient breakdowns are similar. title: Meal Reminder - Weight Loss
description:
Eat healthy, eat regularly, eat 5 meals a day. Run metabolism and lose weight.

Meal Reminder is a simple application helping you to keep eating regularly.

Remember that eating 5 meals a day (with around 3 hours intervals) has many advantages:
• Accelerates your body fat burning, which causes weight loss or helps to maintain your weight
• Helps you to control the quantity of every meal and prevents overeating
• Regular breaks between meals protect from sudden decrease of the glucose level in your blood and ensure satiety

Meal Reminder - Weight Loss application helps you to follow this easy diet plan by following features:
• Custom meal times to suit your needs
• Alarms to notify you about meal time
• Status of current day to see either meals were eaten or skipped
• Possibility of adding 6th, optional meal, if you get up early and finish your day late at night
• Editing past meals - just swipe the meal item on the list and use edit buttons (if you want to change the past meal status, click on the meal item)

Any comments are welcome. Please notify me if there are any functions that you want to be included in future versions of Meal Reminder - Weight Loss.

Thank you for download!

comments: Cool concept but it doesn't let you schedule times. The programing not allowing for times to be set properly. Freezes and crashes. everytime I opened the scheduler it would choose random time of the day on its own around 1 am.

The 'skip meal button' is right underneath the 'ok' button with no way to change the meals marked as skipped. The app comes up over EVERYTHING so on a work call it will pop up over it and blare the alarm. It has absolute priority which is awful. I liked the concept but there's a few things they need to change with this app.

This is app is great if all you want is a reminder to eat and at what time. Only thing that would be good to change is that if you accidently hit skip meal instead of eat meal. That you could change it back. Otherwise it's good.

It gets the job done, I just feel like there's too many notifications outside of that you can make your own sound if you like but if it was just a quick let's eat or skip the meal option 5 but it's like two more notifications after the meal reminder I kind of think it's unnecessary each time

I love this app for the theoritical explanation of meal importance, for cute design and for notifications! But that's really inconvenient, when I accidentally tap meal or set the other time of meal after I set it eaten, so it became missed. But in general app is nice!

description:
SuperFood - Healthy Recipes offers free access to tasty and healthy recipes using regional ingredients that you can save in our grocery list. Our individual calorie counter allows you to track your meals with relevant nutrition information. Keep a nutrition diary and track your calories on a daily, weekly and monthly basis with our free calorie calculator! 

We offer a healthy diet through a diverse selection of healthy recipes, easy to cook - from local and seasonal dishes to low-carb and yummy vegetarian recipes. 

For a healthy diet we need healthy recipes. Superfood nutrition can help you to reduce health risks. People in western countries are increasingly suffering from cancer, heart disease, high blood levels and high blood pressure, obesity and diabetes. Superfoods are good at controlling these symptoms by strengthening the immune system, providing better fat, providing enough fiber and meeting our protein needs.

title: WW (Weight Watchers Reimagined)
description:
WW is ranked the #1 doctor-recommended weight-loss program*, and for the ninth year in a row, WW has been named “#1 Best Diet for Weight Loss” by U.S. News & World Report. The myWW™ program from Weight Watchers Reimagined is more than a weight-loss app—it’s a complete wellness solution. Built by the leading experts in weight loss, designed for your real life.


Download the WW app and enjoy a free trial for access to food and activity tracking, thousands of delicious recipes, water tracking, sleep tracking, and of course, science-backed techniques to help you reach your weight-loss and wellness goals. 


HOW IT WORKS


We’ve introduced myWW™, our most customized program ever, proven to make losing weight easier‡! First, through a personal assessment, we learn about your unique needs and preferences, and then we match you with a customized weight loss plan. Backed by the latest nutritional and behavioral science, myWW™ guides you toward a balanced diet and helps you build healthy habits for life. 


Food: Learn to incorporate healthier choices into your diet and lose weight with a personalized SmartPoints® Budget and ZeroPoint™ food list of items you don’t need to measure or track. Use our Barcode Scanner to scan foods at grocery stores, search our database of nearly 300,000 foods, over 8,000 WW recipes and 86,000 meals from nearly 400 popular restaurants. Browse by meal time, dietary needs, and more to find delicious meals to satisfy any taste! 


Activity: The app’s activity tracker helps you make progress towards your fitness goals. Sync your fitness device and convert your daily moves into FitPoints®, calculated based on your height, weight, age, sex, and type and duration of exercise. WW has also partnered with Aaptiv and FitOn to help you work out comfortably from home, at every level. 


New Tracking Features: You asked, we answered! The WW app now includes Sleep tracking, Water tracking, and Weight tracking. See how sleep plays a role in your weight-loss journey. Water tracking is simpler: tap the “+” icon in the water row on your home screen. Tracking weight is more mindful: note your habits, challenges, proud moments, and future goals.


Mindset: When it comes to health and wellness, taking care of your mind is just as important as taking care of your body. That’s why WW has partnered with leading meditation and sleep app Headspace to bring moments of mindfulness to your wellness journey. 


Rewards: Earn “Wins” as you track your food, activity, and weight, which you can trade for free WellnessWins™ rewards. 


24/7 COMMUNITY & LIVE COACHING

Join the WW members-only social network, Connect. Need expert guidance? Chat with our WW Coaches any time with 24/7 Live Coaching. Looking for more support? Sign-up for a Workshop membership to connect with a WW Coach and other members in live weekly sessions, either through Zoom or in-person.


MEMBERSHIP PRICING & TERMS

WW Digital membership includes our food, activity, and weight tracking features, WellnessWins rewards program, 24/7 Live Coaching, access to our online community, and more.


*Based on a 2019 survey of 500 doctors who recommend weight-loss programs to patients.
‡In 6-mo study, 88% of participants said myWW was an easier way to lose weight vs. when they tried on their own, funded by WW.
Privacy Policy: https://www.weightwatchers.com/us/privacy/policy
Terms of Service: https://www.weightwatchers.com/us/termsandconditions/onlineplus-coaching
