title: Keto diet app - Veg keto recipes
description:
Are you looking for a vegetarian keto diet app to start a vegetarian diet plan for weight loss? We bring you the best keto diet tracker vegetarian app to begin a healthy diet. 

Losing weight is not an easy task. Only through following a disciplined keto lifestyle, we can achieve it. Our vegetarian keto recipes free app believes that by following a veg keto diet plan and through following keto exercise or keto home workout we can lose weight. Restore insulin sensitivity and get into ketosis using our vegetarian keto diet plan. 

What is keto diet?
The ketogenic diet is a high fat low carb diet. We significantly reduce the carbohydrate intake and replace it with recipes which are high in fat. The reduction in carbs helps in converting body fats to ketones, putting our body through a metabolic state called ketosis. Ketones can supply energy.

 In a vegetarian keto diet plan, we integrate the rules of vegetarianism and keto diet. Our vegetarian keto diet tracker app free follows a meal plan that consists of recipes made of healthy fats such as coconut oil, avocados, seeds, eggs and nuts. 

Our vegetarian keto diet app free app consists of high fat recipes, dishes that are in low in carbohydrates and contains adequate protein to induce weight loss. The ketogenic net carb tracker also suggests recipes that are below 1200 calories - 1500 calories. 

Try out tasty keto breakfast lunch and dinner daily. We have a created a vegetarian keto meal plan for 28 days and more. 

Some popular categories of vegetarian keto tracker app are:-
< Easy keto recipes free for beginners < Ultra low calorie vegetarian recipes < 14-day starch free diet < Complete ketosis cookbook for vegans < Keto bread < Keto broccoli & healthy avocado recipes < Vegetarian meal planner while eating out < Easy ketogenic recipes for beginners cooking < A personalized 28 days keto diet plan free for weight loss < Keto carb manager for fitness collection. 


We have designed vegetarian keto recipes free with features like:

1. Choose from your favourite low carb vegetarian recipes collection. 
2. Our keto carb manager can share the nutritional information ( macros) such as calories, protein and fat and most importantly carbs included in each recipe. 
3. Tasty vegetarian keto diet recipes with carbs below 10g and calories below 500 kcal. 
4. Built-in vegetarian keto diet tracker and a smart meal planner. 
5. Free keto vegetarian recipes to explore each curated recipe collections.
6. Get the best vegetarian diet plan for weight loss. 
7. Easy vegetarian low carb recipes suitable for a keto vegan diet as well. 
8. Share vegetarian keto recipes with your loved ones. 
9. Integrated keto food tracker to track your daily meal plans
10. Much high fat food recipes to help you follow a keto diet for vegetarian. 
11. Get a keto guide and food articles to help you in your weight loss journey. 
12. Amazing collection of keto veg recipes to share with friends on your diet journey. 
13. Separate collection of keto breakfast recipes, recipes for lunch and dinner, ketogenic juice, vegetarian keto recipes free and much more. 
14. Get a ketogenic food list and shopping list to help you with grocery shopping. 
15. Celebrate festivals and special occasions and create meal plans using keto recipes for vegetarian. 
16. Smart notifications by keto diet tracker to stick on a ketogenic diet daily.

Our vegetarian keto diet app focuses on blood sugar control, weight loss, reduced risk of cholesterol, heart disease, hormonal control and brain health. 

Download the best low carb vegetarian diet apps for weight loss and fitness today. Start cooking with the best vegetarian keto recipes free. Enjoy the vegetarian keto diet app.

title: Calorie Counter and Exercise Diary XBodyBuild
description:
A lot of people dream of a beautiful body because having one ensures certain benefits, confidence and good health. 
Control over the process of your body transformation is the key to success. Our XBodyBuild app will help you 
change your behavior and lifestyle to achieve your fitness goals. The app can be used by both professionals and amateurs. 


XBodyBuild capabilities include:
Food Diary 
	● Enter your meal information to monitor your calorie intake and sum of proteins, fats, and carbs
	● Specify your desired daily calorie intake to keep track of your remaining calorie, protein, fat and carb needs,  or to know by how many calories, proteins, fats and carbs you’ve exceeded your desired daily intake
	● Calculate your recommended intake of calories, proteins, fats, and carbs


Workout Diary
	● Set up exercise measures
	● Create exercises (superset, triset, round)
	● Create workout plans
	● Make notes about your exercises, workouts, or workout plans
	● Measure your body


XBodyBuild advantages include:
	Food Diary

Workout Diary

	General

	● The app doesn’t require an Internet connection

title: Keto Diet Recipe
description:
Delicious and Healthy Keto recipes, complete with nutritional information, all packed into Keto Diet Recipe app.

Hundreds of Keto Diet Recipes. Beautiful and smooth UI.
Small app size less than 3 Mb.

Looking for healthy and Easy Keto Diet Recipes? And how to make them? You are just in the right place!
Each recipe comes complete with protein, net carbs and fat nutritional information.

> Easy User Interface
> Smooth Performance
> Detailed recipes with Calories, Net Carb, Fat and Protein
> Can make favourite recipe List
> Can make the Grocery List

CATEGORIES:

> Keto Breakfast Recipes
> Keto Lunch Recipes
> Keto Dinner Recipes
> Keto Snack Recipes
> Keto Side Dish Recipes
> Keto Dessert Recipes
> Keto Condiment Recipes
> Keto Smoothie Recipes

WHAT IS THE KETO DIET?

The keto diet (also known as a ketogenic diet, low carb diet and LCHF diet) is a low carbohydrate, high-fat diet. Maintaining a low carb diet is great for weight loss. Moreover, according to an increasing number of studies, a low carb diet helps reduce risk factors for diabetes, heart diseases, stroke, Alzheimer’s, epilepsy, and more!

WHY REDUCE CARBS ON A KETO DIET?

We’re beginning to understand that carbs in large quantities are more harmful than previously thought, while most fats are healthy & essential (the basis of a low carb diet).

When you eat lots of carbs, your blood sugar is consistently elevated and, as a result, so is insulin. Insulin is a hormone that keeps your blood sugar in check by shuttling the glucose into cells, but when there’s a consistently high amount of insulin, your cells become resistant.

This insulin resistance makes it easier to store fat, and chronically high levels of insulin also cause excessive inflammation in the body, which contributes to heart disease, high blood pressure and eventually type 2 diabetes.

A keto diet can reverse these harmful effects & restores insulin sensitivity.

THE KETO DIET IS A NUTRITION REVOLUTION!

The nutritional landscape is changing. The keto diet (low carb diet) is growing in acceptance and a nutritional revolution is beginning. We are starting to realize the detrimental effects of our relationship with excess sugar & carbs.

The keto diet focuses on low carb recipes to keep your blood sugar stable, helping your body regain insulin sensitivity and keeping your mood & energy levels stable.

When you’re on a ketogenic diet, you can expect to:

• Lose body fat
• Have consistent energy levels during the day
• Stay satiated after meals longer, with less snacking and overeating

HUNDREDS OF LOW CARB DIET & KETO RECIPES!

Keto recipes make you feel better, live better and eat better. Each low carb recipe is delicious – we know because we only share the ones we love.

We’ve included hundreds of low carb recipes for you to choose from. The main goal of these low carb recipes is to:

• Keep carbs low – under 25g a day, ideally
• Increase your protein intake – aim for at least 60g a day
• Keep you full and satiated from delicious meals.

We’re beginning to understand that carbs in large quantities are more harmful than previously thought, while most fats are healthy & essential (the basis of a low carb diet).

When you eat lots of carbs, your blood sugar is consistently elevated and, as a result, so is insulin. Insulin is a hormone that keeps your blood sugar in check by shuttling the glucose into cells, but when there’s a consistently high amount of insulin, your cells become resistant.

This insulin resistance makes it easier to store fat, and chronically high levels of insulin also cause excessive inflammation in the body, which contributes to heart disease, high blood pressure and eventually type 2 diabetes.

A keto diet can reverse these harmful effects & restores insulin sensitivity.

THE KETO DIET IS A NUTRITION REVOLUTION!

The nutritional landscape is changing. The keto diet (low carb diet) is growing in acceptance and a nutritional revolution is beginning. We are starting to realize the detrimental effects of our relationship with excess sugar & carbs.

The keto diet focuses on low carb recipes to keep your blood sugar stable, helping your body regain insulin sensitivity and keeping your mood & energy levels stable.

When you’re on a ketogenic diet, you can expect to:

• Lose body fat
• Have consistent energy levels during the day
• Stay satiated after meals longer, with less snacking and overeating

HUNDREDS OF LOW CARB DIET & KETO RECIPES!

Keto recipes make you feel better, live better and eat better. Each low carb recipe is delicious – we know because we only share the ones we love.

We’ve included hundreds of low carb recipes for you to choose from. The main goal of these low carb recipes is to:

• Keep carbs low – under 25g a day, ideally
• Increase your protein intake – aim for at least 60g a day
• Keep you full and satiated from delicious meals.

title: Diabetic Diet Plan Chart
description:
Diabetic Diet Plan - Manage Diabetes with Diet, If some is suffering from diabetes, it means that his body cannot produce insulin in normal fashion. As a result, it increases the glucose level in the blood. Switching to healthy diabetic diet plan can be of help at this time. Planning for an appropriate diet is a crucial part of your treatment journey, because it can manage the level of glucose in your blood.

List Topics will discuss:

diabetic diet chart
diabetes food list	
diabetic diet recipes

Features of the app:

Can Use For Offline App
Updated regularly
You can ask questions from our experts
Simple app book Knowledge like pocket on your phone
You can also send us your suggestions and we will add them inside the app For more updates.

Learn Here about Diabetic Diet Plan:

Sensible selections of food along with healthy and disciplined lifestyle are the two key success points of diabetic treatment. A healthy diabetic diet plan must include six essential factors such as restricting consumption for sweet products, frequent eating, attentive towards carbohydrate consumption, consume plenty amount of whole grain foods, fruits and vegetables, eating low-fat products, restriction in alcohol consumption.

Diabetic Diet

If you are having diabetes, it doesn't mean that you should start eating special foods or depend on only strict diabetic diet plan. In most of the case, it is simply switching to a variety of foods in moderate amounts but following a fixed timing.

You should not follow a complicated diabetic diet plan, rather your diet should comprise with a wise selection of nutrients and low in calorie and fatty contents. There are two essential factors that you must not forget while preparing your diet plan. One is eating foods at regular time every day and the second point is the selection of healthy food in right amounts.

Carbohydrate counting is a crucial part for healthy diet plan, especially if you are on insulin medication. In fact, fat and protein counting is not as important as carbohydrate counting is. But that doesn't mean you should not be careful enough about the fat or protein intake. High calorie and high fat always increase the risk of various health complications including cardiac problems, high cholesterol and high blood pressure.

Diabetic Diet and Sweets Consumption

The fact says if you are suffering from diabetes, all your near and dear ones continuously warn you not to have sweets in your diet. Contrary to popular belief, scientific studies confirmed that sweets may not produce any harm if it can be used in a balanced amount in the meal plan. Although, different sweets affect blood sugar level in a varied fashion, but the total carbohydrate count matters the most. If you consider a small amount of sweets in your overall diabetic diet plan, it will not harm your health.

Download Diabetic Diet Plan now for more information.

title: Glucose Buddy Diabetes Tracker
description:
RANKED #1 DIABETES MANAGEMENT APP FOR OVER 10 YEARS. 
Glucose Buddy is the most comprehensive diabetes management app. 

Ranked #1 Diabetes iPhone Application by Manny Hernandez, Founder of TuDiabetes.com

As seen on American Diabetes Association's Forecast Magazine, NYTimes, Wired Magazine, DiabetesMine.com, MedGadget.com, Mendosa.com, Diabetes Health Magazine, JDRF Newsletters and MobiHealthNews. 

FEATURES:
- Easily log blood glucose, medication, meals, in one entry 
- Track trends in your blood sugar, insulin, weight, blood pressure, A1C, and more!

comments: Lots of potential, too bad I can't get it to work. The app has everything I wanted to track and taking pictures of my food to identify is great. The first day it worked amazing. Easy to use, tracks what is needed for your doctor's visits...been using this app for years and they are always updating it to ensure we have the best tool to use for Diabetics.

title: LIFE Extend - Complete Health & Wellness Tracker
description:
Keeping yourself healthy can be a challenging experience, this why we at Life Extend
Created this simple health app, health tracker app for you to achieve your life and health goals!

Start to be the better version of yourself with this simple health app:
LIFE Extend: Healthy Living & Lifestyle - Wellness Living 🧘 

We included all the best features for you to get healthy and achieve wellness living!

It can be your diet-tracker, fasting timer, or simply life tracker app.

We have everything for you to get healthy in this simple health app. If you are new to the concept of intermittent fasting you can chat with one of our experts and get all the information you need with our amazing health tracker.

A good and reliable  Diet-tracker & nutrition tracker can truly help you to get healthy with intermittent fasting or fasting timer, but we also provide great insights and the opportunity to consult with one of Life Extend experts about wellness living intermittent fasting or just about how you can become the healthiest you with this life tracker app!

These days keeping your immune system healthy is a top priority for everyone.
Boost your immune system with Healthy Living & Lifestyle - Diet-Tracker 🏃 - health tracker. We have the optimal fasting timer.

Healthy living is a lifestyle that most of us desire to achieve, you want to be the healthiest you can be especially in these wild times.

With 🏃Life Extend  🏃you can improve your lifestyle we will help you to build habits of health with our fitness & nutrition tracker app!

With Healthy Living & Nutrition Tracker: Life Extend 🏃we make it simple for you to apply habits of health to become the healthiest you.

This is not just an ordinary health and fitness app, it’s a health tracker, a fitness tracker, and includes everything you need to become the healthiest you and build the right habits of health

Lose weight, build muscle, improve your immune system, reduce your risk of heart disease and cancer, improve your brain function, recover better from stress, and eat for longevity.

Apply the right habits of health to become the healthiest you can be!

LIFE Extend makes it fun and easy to create healthy habits within these 5 Pillars:

1) Eating healthy plans
2) Exercising
3) Sleeping at least 7 hours per night,
4) Practicing overnight Fasting
5) Mindfulness and Meditation

Track your activity, your diet, and what you are eating, develop healthier habits, and be conscious of your progress with this health tracker app.

Live a healthier life by tracking your sleep, nutrition, meditation, and exercise daily for health and fitness.

Fasting improves your metabolic health, reduces inflammation, and lowers your risk of diabetes. A diverse exercise routine is the #1 best lifestyle intervention to protect you from disease and death.

Download LIFE Extend today to:

• Easily develop new healthy habits
• Earn LIFE Points for tracking daily healthy behaviors. Aim for 10,000 LIFE Points per day for badges and future rewards!
• Track your daily intake of fruits, vegetables, nuts and oils.
• Track your intermittent fasting schedule - easily start, stop and edit.
• Track your daily physical activity minutes and see measures of your physical fitness improve as a result.
• Track your mindfulness minutes and reduce stress.
• Track your sleep duration and quality.
• Track your biological age and estimated lifespan.
• See your biological age decreases and the estimated lifespan increase as you develop healthier habits!
• Join Circles to share your progress with family members, friends, or health coaches.
• Get encouragement from your peers, coaches and health professionals when you are struggling!
• Share health accomplishments, mood updates, stories and photos in a social Feed to spread the encouragement.
• Learn more about lifestyle changes for healthy living and aging with a Learning Library complete with hundreds of science-backed articles and videos.

title: Atkins Nutrition 🆚 Keto Diet - Weight Watch Guide
description:
Atkins diet and Keto diet are both very popular low carb diets.
With more than 20 short lessons, this diet app we will go in depth to Keto and Atkins diets, you will know exactly why and how each of them works, the pros and the cons and of course you’ll find out which is the best match for you.

The ketogenic diet plan, or keto, is getting the type of buzz that the Atkins Diet created when it first emerged. With both low-carb diet regimens, the suggestion is to reduce weight by cutting carbs while eating more fat than most diet plans or dietary nutrition standards recommended. Since invented, many weight watchers and people that want to lose weight use both diets and has a lot to tell us about the process and the success rate.
🥑 The focus on reduced carbs as well as higher fat is similar, particularly in the first, most-restrictive Atkins phase. In Atkin Phase 1, overall carbohydrates comprise just 10% of calories from everyday dishes. For keto, in general, complete carbohydrates are also reduced at 7% of day-to-day meals.
We check differences and similarities in terms of price/cost, health benefits, weight loss impact and risks
🥑 The Atkins diet, officially called the Atkins Nutritional Plan, is a low-carb diet regimen developed by Robert.  Atkins stated that he made use of the study to fix his own overweight condition. 

🥑 The four stages - There are four stages of the Atkins diet plan: induction, recurring weight-loss, pre-maintenance and also life time upkeep.
Step 1 - Induction - Induction is the most restrictive stage of the Atkins Nutritional Strategy. 2 weeks are suggested for this stage. It is meant to create the body to swiftly get in a state of ketosis. 
Step 2- Continuous weight reduction - The Continuous Fat Burning (OWL) stage of Atkins contains a boost in carb consumption, yet continuing to be at degrees where weight reduction takes place
Step 3 - Pre-maintenance 
Step 4 - Life time 

🥑 Nature of the atkins diet -The Atkins diet regimen involves restricted intake of carbohydrates to change the body's metabolic process from metabolizing sugar as energy over to converting stored body fat to power. This process, called ketosis, starts when insulin degrees are reduced; in regular humans, insulin is most affordable when blood sugar levels are reduced (mainly prior to eating). 

🥑 The ketogenic diet plan (or keto, for short) is a low-carb, high-fat diet plan that provides great deals of health advantages. Actually, over 20 researches expose that this sort of diet regimen plan can assist you reduce weight as well as boost your wellness.
Possible healing uses for the keto diet plan have in fact been checked out for countless additional neurological conditions, a few of which include: Alzheimer's condition, amyotrophic side sclerosis, migraine headache, neurotrauma, discomfort, Parkinson's condition, and also remainder issues. Ketogenic diet plan regimens may even have advantages versus diabetes mellitus, cancer, epilepsy as well as more.

🥑 Learn What Is a Ketogenic Diet plan?

🥑Types of Ketogenic Diet Regimens

🥑 Keto foods to Eat and Non-keto foods to Stay clear of

🥑 Sample meal plan for one day

🥑 Keto calculator – Learn about your statistics and build a custom plan


Are you weight losers / weight watchers? 
Download now!

title: dietgene - DNA Testing, Diet, Recipes & Health App
description:
Ever feel like your diet isn’t really made for you? That’s because it isn’t! Personalize your diet with dietgene. Match your meal planning to personal preferences, genetic background, and your DNA analysis from 23andMe or Ancestry. 
 
Even if you don’t have a DNA test, track your calories, meals, weight, exercise, routines, nutrition, and get custom recipe recommendations for YOUR health every day with dietgene. 
 
How does it work?
1. After launch, dietgene will prompt you to import your 23andMe or Ancestry DNA raw data file.* 
2. Instantly, dietgene will analyze your DNA file to provide you with the optimal diet for you FREE!
3. You will get daily meal recommendations that will help you improve your diet and lose weight.
 
*If you don’t have a DNA (genetic) test, don’t worry, you can still get personalized diet and recipe recommendations according to your preferences and profile answers. You will have the option to manually select either a low-carb, low-fat, or Mediterranean diet to see meal recommendations and manage your nutrient and calorie levels.
 
HEALTHY MEAL PLANNING
-Check dietgene every day to get delicious healthy recipes for breakfast, lunch, & dinner that match your nutrient and calorie goals.
-Filter and browse options based on your DNA results, favorite foods, healthiest options, or most popular meals.
-Track your meal plans, see your diet progress, and get alerts to keep you on your goals and enjoying the latest fresh tastes.
-Analyze your diet choices and food options and get suggestions about your diet, health, and achieving your weight loss goals.
-Manage your heart healthy or diabetic diet plan and discover heart or diabetes-friendly recipes.
 
CALORIE AND NUTRIENT COUNTING
-Based on your biology, dietgene will optimize your calorie and nutrient levels to help you manage your meals and weight loss.
-Detailed recipes and meals with nutritional information is a click away, add your meal and dietgene calculates everything for you.
 
LOG YOUR EXERCISE 
-Sync your Apple Health, Google Fit or FitBit to dietgene and your activity data and basal energy will help optimize your diet plan.
-Compare calories burned from various exercises and track your activity according to a distance log.
-Log your weight and see your progress over time.
 
WE CARE ABOUT YOUR PRIVACY
dietgene ensures that your account and genetic file is secured and encrypted.

title: Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes
description:
Our Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes App provide a simple way for busy singles, couples, and families to plan their meals and eat healthier. Our healthy Meal Planner for Weight Loss & healthy recipes are highly customizable so you can easily personalize a plan that works with your unique tastes and lifestyle.

Reasons you will love this app

✔ 3 delicious healthy recipes for free for quick cooking, every day
✔ Varied free healthy recipes 
✔ Awesome Meal Planner for Weight Loss
✔ Step-by-step photo tutorials to make sure each dish is foolproof
✔ Save your favorite recipes in your personal list to cook them later
✔ Quickly find the right dish with a recipe filter
✔ Share your favorite recipes with friends
✔ Find the nearest grocery store on the integrated map
✔ Create a shopping list of several recipes, including prices
✔ Portion calculator and nutritional information
✔ Free cooking app

We offer to you a lot of weight loss recipes: main dishes weight loss recipes, snack weight loss recipes, salad weight loss recipes, soup weight loss recipes, sweet weight loss recipes, juice and freches weight loss recipes, low carb meat, low carb fish, low carb chicken, low fat casseroles, low carb breakfast, weight loss baking, weight loss pizza and other weight loss recipes.

All weight loss recipes are presented with simple and detailed instructions and photo.

Sign up to Recipes of the Day and join over 1,000,000 people who have used our Meal Planner for Weight Loss to eat healthier, reduce stress, lose weight, save money, and live happier, more productive lives.

Check out our top 5 benefits and features:

1. Cook healthy meals in about 30 minutes or less (even if you don't know how to cook)
We've reimagined and streamlined the cooking experience. Prepare meals quickly with our step-by-step and hassle-free cooking instructions.

You'll never again have to jump around looking for an ingredient, instruction, or piece of cookware that you may have overlooked.

2. No more stressful "What should I eat?" decisions to make
Each week you'll have a personalized meal plan with simple & healthy recipes that are catered to your exact needs and preferences.

Eliminate decision fatigue after a long day's work - simply pick a recipe from your meal plan and cook it in less time than it takes to pick up an unhealthy (and expensive) takeout meal.

3. Healthy meal plans that are uniquely your own
With the most personalization options of any minimal-waste meal planner out there, you can cook exactly how you want to eat.

From classic, flexitarian, pescetarian, low carb, paleo, keto, vegetarian & vegan diet types to gluten-free, shellfish free, fish free, dairy free, peanut free, tree nut free, soy free, egg free, sesame free, and mustard free allergy restrictions to 119 individual dislikable ingredients, your meal plans will be truly personalized to your specific needs.

4. Optimized & super fast grocery lists
When you build a new meal plan, a grocery list of all the ingredients you'll need for the week is automatically created. Simply grab your mobile, head to the grocery store, and get all your week's shopping done in about 20 minutes with our step-by-step grocery list optimized with standard grocery store layouts in mind.

5. Save money with minimal food waste
It's annoying when you purchase ingredients from the grocery store, cook a meal or two, and have a bunch of ingredients going bad by the end of the week, isn't it?

✔ Create a shopping list of several recipes, including prices
✔ Portion calculator and nutritional information
✔ Free cooking app

We offer to you a lot of weight loss recipes: main dishes weight loss recipes, snack weight loss recipes, salad weight loss recipes, soup weight loss recipes, sweet weight loss recipes, juice and freches weight loss recipes, low carb meat, low carb fish, low carb chicken, low fat casseroles, low carb breakfast, weight loss baking, weight loss pizza and other weight loss recipes.

All weight loss recipes are presented with simple and detailed instructions and photo.

Sign up to Recipes of the Day and join over 1,000,000 people who have used our Meal Planner for Weight Loss to eat healthier, reduce stress, lose weight, save money, and live happier, more productive lives.

Check out our top 5 benefits and features:

1. Cook healthy meals in about 30 minutes or less (even if you don't know how to cook)
We've reimagined and streamlined the cooking experience. Prepare meals quickly with our step-by-step and hassle-free cooking instructions.

You'll never again have to jump around looking for an ingredient, instruction, or piece of cookware that you may have overlooked.

2. No more stressful "What should I eat?" decisions to make
Each week you'll have a personalized meal plan with simple & healthy recipes that are catered to your exact needs and preferences.

Eliminate decision fatigue after a long day's work - simply pick a recipe from your meal plan and cook it in less time than it takes to pick up an unhealthy (and expensive) takeout meal.

3. Healthy meal plans that are uniquely your own
With the most personalization options of any minimal-waste meal planner out there, you can cook exactly how you want to eat.

From classic, flexitarian, pescetarian, low carb, paleo, keto, vegetarian & vegan diet types to gluten-free, shellfish free, fish free, dairy free, peanut free, tree nut free, soy free, egg free, sesame free, and mustard free allergy restrictions to 119 individual dislikable ingredients, your meal plans will be truly personalized to your specific needs.

4. Optimized & super fast grocery lists
When you build a new meal plan, a grocery list of all the ingredients you'll need for the week is automatically created. Simply grab your mobile, head to the grocery store, and get all your week's shopping done in about 20 minutes with our step-by-step grocery list optimized with standard grocery store layouts in mind.

5. Save money with minimal food waste
It's annoying when you purchase ingredients from the grocery store, cook a meal or two, and have a bunch of ingredients going bad by the end of the week, isn't it?

title: South Beach Diet Tracker
description:
The Official South Beach Diet® Tracker app is designed to make the keto-friendly South Beach Diet easy and effective for healthy weight loss. Access your meal plan, track your food, macros, activity and progress, find delicious recipes and more!

What is keto-friendly? The South Beach Diet takes the best of keto and makes it easier to follow with a low-carb, healthy-fat approach that delivers the weight loss benefits of keto.

Stay on track with the All-In-One app! Get instant access to the tips and tools you need to reach your goals.

JOURNAL
• Easily log your daily food, water and activity
• Quick Log your food in a cinch without searching
• Advanced water logging with a dynamic water goal calculation based on your weight
• Calorie header tracks your calorie goal for the day at the top of the journal

MEAL PLAN
• Full meal plan guidance – know exactly what to eat and when
• Multi-plan support so no matter which South Beach Diet plan you’re on, you can always be up-to-date with your current meal plan
• Flexible plan start date for more accurate goal tracking

MACRO TRACKING
• My Macros screen automatically tracks and calculates your target goals for key nutrients like fat, protein and net carbs to keep you on track

FOOD SEARCH
• Search for South Beach Diet approved foods
• Simply scan barcodes to log South Beach meals and snacks
• Create your own custom foods
• Save the foods you eat most often in your favorites

ONE-TOUCH ACCESS TO THE PALM
• Never miss a beat with the Palm – the official South Beach Diet blog! Get motivated with the latest weight loss articles at your fingertips
• Get an idea for dinner tonight, check out a new workout routine, or read an inspiring article when you need it
• Receive daily DIY recipes and keto-friendly lifestyle tips

RECIPES
• Find South Beach Diet approved recipes
• Search by plan, mealtime or food category
• Save recipes to your favorites to get quick access to the recipes you love

PROGRESS
• Track your weight and see your progress in charts and graphs
• Easily upload milestone photos along your weight loss journey
• Check out your weight loss milestones badges to see how far you’ve come

REWARDS & CHALLENGES
• Get exclusive in-app offers
• Earn exciting prizes with app-only challenges
• Celebrate your success by sharing challenge and weight loss milestone badges on social media – right from the app!

Stay on track with the SOUTH BEACH DIET® TRACKER APP – Download the FREE app today!

comments: This app is making me sign in several times a day which is very annoying. Other than that I like it. It helped me lose 50 pounds.

This app is junk!! I try to put in my info and it keeps saying "Alert fill in all fields" when all of them are!! The amount of money you spend on the food you would think they could afford for their app to work!!

This app needs A LOT of work! I haven't used it long (2 weeks), but after using Myfitnesspal previously, the problems are glaring. I bought the new South Beach book and thought this app would be a seemless addition to the diet plan. Wrong! 1. The scanner hardly recognizes any of the foods I try to scan whether it is a food on its own or something I want to use in a recipe. 2. The recipes on the blog/newfeed can't be added to your daily log. You have to create a new food for each recipe. This is very time consuming and gets more annoying each time. 3. Some of the nutritional information doesn't show up for some their own recipes!! 4. You can't create a recipe on the log anywhere. You have to create it somewhere else, figure out the nutritional data and then manually enter that by creating a new food. 5. None of the recipes from the new book are online or available in the log. Again, they have to be entered manually! 6. There are few "Homemade" versions of foods listed. Most are Southbeach packaged foods or restaurant/grocery versions. The frustration of using this app makes me want to quit the diet altogether!!!!! Please make it more user friendly. I know you want people to buy your prepackaged food (all of which is listed to log), but then don't advertise this as an app for the diet or new books as they come out. They aren't.

The app works fine. Sometimes you have to enter in the nutritional values for the foods you scan, including some of their own products, but once you do it one time, it's there for good. It has made tracking what I need to eat easier than keeping the book on me. I'm down 15 pounds after 2 weeks. My only beef is, what you do after week two is so confusing now. There use to be a phase 1,2, and 3. Some of the foods they send you are labeled in phases, however, the books mention nothing about it now!

I have an LG V35 ThinQ Android phone and it works flawlessly. It is a godsend for planning my daily schedule of foods to eat during the day. I would be lost without it. Well designed and well executed. Maybe folks are trying to install the app on their iPhone 3s and $20 burner prepaid Android phones, or haters or there was a recent update to the app or something. I dunno but it is flawless. If you have a full featured higher end phone, I suspect you will love the app.

title: Rina 90 Day Diet For Weight Loss
description:
Say yes to the weight-loss Rina Diet with proven results. Just 90 days to a more toned & ripped you – without feeling hungry.

THE SMART WAY TO LOSE WEIGHT

Lose weight with an ease, but with no deprivation of any food products. The only thing you should do is to stick to correct food grouping nutrition. In other words, you should know what proteins, beans and legumes, carbohydrates and fruits are, as well as the proper order of their consumption. And that’s what 90 Day Diet does for you.

ENJOY YOUR FAVOURITE FOODS

Most of you will be pleasantly surprised that during the carbohydrate day you can literally eat what you want, including your top favourite food. It’s the day you can even enjoy your beloved chocolate, have a cake and grab an ice-cream on a sunny walk!

NO YO-YO EFFECT

There’s no reason to worry about any yo-yo effect after the end of the diet or about the stress you can put your body on when keeping it. The best part is that when you finish it, your body will not crave for the types of foods you missed (unlike other weight loss diet plans, here they are all covered).

RINA 90 DAYS DIET FEATURES:

✓ 90 days diet plan
✓ meal suggestions for breakfast, lunch, dinner
✓ recipes
✓ neatly organized meal planner calendar
✓ weight tracker
✓ waist size tracker
✓ kg/cm & lbs/inch preferences
✓ beautiful graphs

There’s no place for any worries in this diet at all! So are you ready to lose weight easily?

Let’s get started then! 👍

title: Easy Keto
description:
This is a low-carb meal plan that makes your body use fats for fuel. Try Easy Keto Diet Now.

What you get with Easy Keto App?
Easy Keto Diet app gives you a quick and easy access to your personalized diet. The benefits are that you receive the diet immediately and you can start to follow it straight away. The Easy Keto Diet is based on your:
* Favorite foods that you choose in the quiz
* Daily activity and lifestyle
* Personal measurements – height, age, current weight and target weight (It could be for weight loss, for building muscle mass or just for maintaining a healthy lifestyle)
* Portion sizes and calories are based on the body/goal needs
After filling the quiz you will also receive a free health summary – BMI, Metabolic age, recommended daily calories, Recommended daily water intake, Achievable weight for the first 30 days.
Included features are:
* Over 150 (A variety of) easy-to-cook recipes including tasty desserts
* Top-up videos for preparing the meals
* Step-by-step picture guide
* Grocery list for every week

Easy Keto Diet app wishes you the best with your Keto Journey.
Auto-renewable subscription disclaimer:
Subscription price: $33; $46 and $66 or equivalent in your local currency
Subscription duration: 3, 6 and 12 months
- Payment will be charged on purchase confirmation.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

Privacy Policy: https://usa.easyketo.diet/data-protection-policy
Terms of Use: https://usa.easyketo.diet/terms

title: Vedique Diet –Dr Shikha NutriHealth Free Diet Plan
description:
Vedique Diet is designed for you to manage your weight and lifestyle disorder. In the App, you can check your body Prakriti (Vatta, Kapha, Pitta) and correspondingly you can check the diet plans for Weight management (Weight Loss / Weight Gain), Cholesterol Management, Diabetes Management, Diet plans for Gym & Kids Nutrition. These Diet Plans are scientifically designed by the experts of Dr Shikha Sharma NutriHealth to improve your Health & Fitness. 


You can check out Recipes for Weight Loss, etc from the App. We have also provided you with the Health Videos where Dr Shikha Sharma (a well-known Celebrity Nutrition Expert) has shared tips for Weight Loss/ Weight gain, PCOS, Diabetes, Cholesterol, etc. You can also check HT Brunch Article by Dr Shikha Sharma.


Best App for Weight Loss, Weight gain, Diabetes, Cholesterol, Gym lovers as this contains personalised Diet plans which will help you all to achieve your target of healthy living. This App is the Best Family Nutrition App which gives Kids Nutrition & Healthy Diets for free.  


Features: 

- Dr Shikha Sharma NutriHealth Free Diet Plans which are personalised as per your Body type (Prakriti)

- Manage Health at home: All the meal plans are designed in a way that you can easily follow them without much effort. They are simple to follow plans.

- Female friendly Health App: The App has diet plans for Gyms and kids nutrition. One can request a callback and ask questions from the health counsellor. There is a separate section for weight loss recipes & healthy diet menu recipes

- Herbs & herbal products suggestion are available as per body type & medical condition. You can consult with an ayurvedic doctor for more information

- Integrated Connected Body Fat Analyser Weighing Scale with your Nutritionist Dashboard. The BFA scale measures Weight, Fat %, Muscle Mass %, Bone % & Hydration %

- If you wish to have Personalised and Customised Diet Plans for Weight Loss, Diabetes, Cholesterol, Pregnancy Plans, etc. you can enrol for our Paid version as well. Here you will get a personal Nutritionist & an Ayurvedic Doctor to help you in achieving your targets

title: Nourishly - Nutrition and Diet
description:
Whether you’re struggling with your weight, trying to make dietary changes for medical reasons, trying to overcome digestive issues, or are working with a health professional and would like to ditch paper diaries, Nourishly is here to make it a whole lot easier!

Nourishly was built with input from leading dietitians, psychologists and researchers to bring together “what works”, including:

☆  Cognitive-behavioral meal, activity, mood, sleep, hunger and temptation tracking
☆  Simple and specialized meal plans
☆  Science backed micro-missions that tweak your habits to unlock "Ah-ha!" moments
☆  Rewards that surprise and delight you along the way
☆  Resilience strategies to help unstick you when needed
☆  Link with your healthcare professional for feedback and precision treatment!

Nourishly had been built with love to make you proud and confident in your relationship with food and your body, so that you can fully participate in all that life has to offer.  

Oh, and we take your privacy and security super seriously. We comply with HIPAA and meet industry-standard security practices.

Please note: There is no calorie counting or advertising in this app. 

6 REASONS WHY YOU SHOULD GIVE IT A TRY

1. LINK WITH YOUR CARE TEAM: Turbo charge the care you receive by linking with your Dietitian, Nutritionist, Psychologist, Doctor, Social Worker, Health Coach, Nurse Practitioner, or Personal Trainer for insight-driven care and feedback in AND out of session. 

2. PERSONALIZED MEAL, MOOD, ACTIVITY AND SYMPTOM TRACKER: You are multi-dimensional, and so should be your trusted tracker! Break free from stock-standard calorie counting with customizable and easy symptom, mood, thought, meal and activity tracking. 

3. 400 SCIENCE-BACKED MISSIONS TO MASTER: Gradually master proven habit-hacks that can help you to manage your symptoms, reach your ideal body weight, and feel energetic in your daily life.

4. COPING SKILLS FOR WHEN YOU GET STUCK: Take advantage of 200+ skills to unstick yourself when mental blockers, negative-self talk, lethargy and anxiety strike.

5. MEAL PLANNING TO THE STARS: Pick from expert curated symptom-specific meal plans, create your own, or link with your nutrition expert for a plan personalized for you. 

6. CELEBRATE WINS WITH REWARDS: Be surprised and delighted by beautiful, funny and thought provoking reflection images and affirmations.

comments: So far I can't even use the app because for 3 days now it keeps telling me that it can't connect to the server. Yesterday I used my other app (recovery path) by the same developers to let them know about the issue but have yet to hear anything back from them. I was really looking forward to using these two apps together as a way of replacing my bad habit with a good one but am quickly getting discouraged. I hope this server issue can be fixed quickly so I can update my review to 5 stars.

Amazing app. I've tried a few food journal apps but this is so personal and motivational. I love how it allows you to log your thoughts, why u ate, ur feelings and exercise logs. Oh, it is just such a cute app.

I love this app because it's well-rounded - I can track my low-FODMAP progression as well as my emotions, make notes of what was affecting me, my IBS symptoms, link up with not only my dietician but my other medical doctors. I use it mostly as my diary but a different one to search for low-FODMAP foods. Haven't used it yet, but I look forward to try the learn section to quiz myself.

I enjoyed using this app on my last tablet but since updating to a new tablet, I have been having trouble logging in, a message saying can't connect to nurishly server, please fix this problem as the app is a really good one

Great app, has helped me change my habits. One thing that's annoying is that it always shows one day ahead of the day it is when I go to check what my plan is for the day. I've tried clearing the cache and it's still not working right.

title: Calorie counter  – Meal planner 2020 👍
description:
Have you repeatedly considered switching to a diet of 1000 kcal or 1200 kcal? Thanks to calorie tables, you can carefully plan a diet menu for the whole day!

Calorie table app - how to lose weight using it?😊

If you want to be fit, you need to take care of what you eat. Diet and Calorie Table are the best Android apps,

Counting calories is one of the most popular ways to fight overweight. Thanks to the knowledge of calorie tables of products, we are able to plan each meal in such a way that its energy value does not exceed 250-300 kcal (because that's how much should provide 3 main dishes eaten during the day).

Calorie table - how to use it? 👍

Before you start preparing a meal, check the energy values of selected products in the calorie table, weigh them and add them together. In order for the result not to be distorted, think about buying kitchen scales, which will show values of approximately 1 g. During the diet, it will help you not only to choose the right portion of meals but also allow you to calculate accurately the number of kcal provided by the meal.

title: Ketogenic Diet : Low Carb Recipes & Keto Diet Plan
description:
Ketogenic Diet  is a free and very easy to use app with tons of delicious recipes to help jumpstart your keto diet. Don't know what you want to have for dinner? No problem! Open our app and browse to the Dinner category, find a recipe, and favorite it for later. So simple!

This Ketogenic Diet : Low Carb Recipes & Keto Diet Plan app will help you to achieve weight loss and improve your health. It is perfect for a beginner because it teaches you fundamental cooking tecniques of the keto diet plan. If you are interested in the Atkins Diet recipes or Paleo diet recipes, then this app might be perfect for you as well since the macronutrient breakdowns are similar. Research shows that if you follow this diet, you will lose weight, improve your blood pressure, reduce the risk for heart disease, and improve your mood Ketogenic Diet.

KETO DIET APP & LOW CARB RECIPE FEATURES:

- Hundreds of Keto Recipes
- Custom Meal Plans - tailored to you
- Keto Calculator - get on track with your low carb diet using our easy-to-use keto calculator.
- Macro Tracker - track your calories & macros every day - being on a low carb diet is easier than ever!
- Truly Low Carb - our macro tracker includes total or net carbs to make your low carb diet even easier to follow.
- Huge Food Database - hundreds of thousands of foods & tons of low carb recipes available for your keto macro tracker.
- Favorites Section - so you can jump straight to the keto and low carb recipes you need.
- Shopping List – add ingredients from keto recipes or your own ingredients.
- Beginner’s Keto Diet Guide - to help you understand everything about the keto diet and get started with your keto diet immediately.
New Keto Recipes Added Daily
- Keto Breakfast Recipes
- Keto Lunch Recipes
- Keto Dinner Recipes
- Keto Snack Recipes
- Ketogenic Diet
- Keto Side Dish Recipes
- Keto Dessert Recipes
- Keto Condiment Recipes
- Personal Favorites to Save Your Favorite Recipes
- Search Specific Ingredients to Find Recipes

Check out some of our favorite recipes:

- Keto Coconut Shrimp
- Keto Cheesy Chicken Casserole
- Keto Parmesan Encrusted Pork Chops
- Keto Spicy Chicken Thighs
- Ketogenic Diet
- Keto Reuben Casserole
- Keto Flank Steak Pinwheels
- And many, many more!

WHAT IS THE KETO DIET?

The keto diet (also known as a ketogenic diet, low carb diet and LCHF diet) is a low carbohydrate, high-fat diet. Maintaining a low carb diet is great for weight loss. Moreover, according to an increasing number of studies, a low carb diet helps reduce risk factors for diabetes, heart diseases, stroke, Alzheimer’s, epilepsy, and more Ketogenic Diet!

WHY REDUCE CARBS ON A KETO DIET?

We’re beginning to understand that carbs in large quantities are more harmful than previously thought, while most fats are healthy & essential (the basis of a low carb diet).

This insulin resistance makes it easier to store fat, and chronically high levels of insulin also cause excessive inflammation in the body, which contributes to heart disease, high blood pressure and eventually type 2 diabetes.

A keto diet can reverse these harmful effects & restores insulin sensitivity.


When you’re on a ketogenic diet, you can expect to:

• Lose body fat
• Have consistent energy levels during the day
• Stay satiated after meals longer, with less snacking and overeating

We’ve included hundreds of low carb recipes for you to choose from. The main goal of these low carb recipes is to:

• Keep carbs low – under 25g a day, ideally
• Increase your protein intake – aim for at least 60g a day
• Keep you full and satiated from delicious meals

The Ketogenic Diet : Low Carb Recipes & Keto Diet Plan Includes:

• What is the Keto Diet?
• Testing for Ketosis
• The Truth About Fat
• What are Macronutrients?
• Long-term Benefits of the Ketogenic Diet
• Day-to-Day Benefits
• Entering Ketosis
Ketogenic Diet
• Diabetes and Ketoacidosis
• What is the Keto Flu; why it happens and how to end it
• And more to help you with your keto diet

title: Healthy Recipes & Calculator
description:
You’re one click away from over 500,000 recipes from the world’s largest healthy recipes website, SparkRecipes.com. All of our recipes have been tried and tested by home cooks just like you, and our app is designed to make it easy for you to whip up favorites wherever you go! Make eating delicious, nutritious meals a snap - all without breaking the bank.

With our free app, you can:

Search our recipe database your way - Looking for a healthy breakfast dish? Need a low fat pasta dish the kids will eat? With Healthy Recipes it’s easy to find a new recipe that fits the bill. Search by meal, cuisine, occasion, course, or prep time.

Find recipes that fit your dietary needs - Whether your diet is gluten free, low carb or vegetarian, we have the recipes for you. Filter for your dietary need and find tasty recipes, fast.

See calories, carbs, and 10 other key nutrients for each recipe - SparkRecipes.com is a sister site to SparkPeople.com, the #1 healthy-living website in the US. Knowing what you eat is the first step towards watching what you eat, so all our recipes feature detailed nutritional information. We make it easy to calculate exactly what’s in what you're eating. Looking for low fat, low carb meals? We’ve got you covered. Just looking for easy recipes that are tasty and quick to make? We have those too. 

Save your favorites - Found a recipe that you love? Save it to your “Favorites” list so you can come back to it. Want to see these recipes from anywhere on the web? Create a free SparkRecipes account and sync your favorite recipes across all your devices.

Integrate with our fitness tracking app - all recipes you save to your “Favorites” list will automatically be synced to our fitness tracking app if you use it as well. Get a better idea of what you eat and how healthy it is! And track the recipes you find in this app in our free diet tracking app with a tap!

Share Recipes with Your Friends - Our app offers seamless sharing of your favorite recipes to Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter or email - give it a try!

Our members love our app and we think you will too. Let's cook up something delicious!

recentChanges: With this release there is much rejoicing, as our Healthy Recipes app now fits all Material Design specifications. This means the app is nicer to look at and easier to use. You’ll love it. ☺
comments: Better than doing a web search for recipes. I am FH and cannot eat refined sugar, refined flour, saturated fats and egg yolks. Trying to do a web search with these variables is mostly useless, especially for desserts. I have an intolerance to bananas and most sugar-free desserts include bananas for some unknown reason. Your filtering is not flawless, but more useful than the web. Great for now, but consider multi- condition filters down the road.

For +6 months, the titles for the banner images on the home screen of the app are cut in half horizontally by the banner images under them. You can figure out that the words under a picture say (e.g.) "50 Seafood Pastas You'll Love" maybe 40% of the time? Also, can't tap on users in the Reviews section + go to their profile + see their submissions? The 'back' button on a related recipe should take you to the original recipe you opened NOT skip back to the home screen! Argh! Otherwise nifty app

Useless, only good for processed foods. I tried creating a simple recipe using fresh ingredients and whenever I did a search, the only items that came up were processed foods or none at all. For instance, when I finally found chicken tenderloins it gave me a fixed amount and I wanted to have the option to enter a certain weight amount. it wouldn't let me. What kind of app is this? this app is not for home Cooks. I'm uninstalling.
Love this app. I have an account with SparkPeople and love their recipes. Can't wait to use this.
Very limited functions. Couldn't edit or delete recipes. Wasted space on my phone. The website is much better.

title: 30 Day Keto Diet Plans
description:
ABOUT 30DAY KETO DIET PLANS:

A keto diet is well known for being a low carb diet, where the body produces ketones in the liver to be used as energy. It’s referred to as many different names, KETOGENIC DIET, LOW CARB. DIET,LOW CARB HIGH FAT (LCHF), etc.

 It's a completely new lifestyle that offers numerous benefits. Most people look into a specific diet to lose weight and the keto diet is one of the most effective ways to lose weight in a healthy manner.

Because the ketogenic diet is using body fat as an energy source, your body will begin to burn the unwanted fat causing obvious weight loss benefits. So here it is,theres lot more to share about Ketogenic Diet.But trust me,this is a better way to burn out your stubborn fats effectively and FASTER!

FEATURES / CONTENTS OF THE APP:
The app contain the following contents:

1.Overview / Introduction to the keto diet (Overview, Benefits, Diet Plan, Side Effects, Keto Foods)
2.30 Day Recipes (Breakfast , Lunch & Dinner Recipes)
3.Calorie Calculator 
4.BMI Calculator

Read trough our app,and you'll understand from the tips and knowledge we're sharing inside!  Share this app with your friend and family,start now to buildup your healthy lifestyle.

title: Recipe IQ: Nutrition Calculator
description:
Healthy eating is now easier than ever with the RecipeIQ app! Why? Most recipes don’t include nutrition facts, which makes it hard to meet dietary guidelines. Luckily, our recipe analyzer reveals nutritional values for conscious home cooking. From creative foodies and cooks to dieters and diabetics, whatever your diet, allergy, or nutritional goal, this is a must-have tool for your kitchen.

RecipeIQ nutrition calculator will help you stay conscious of what you eat every day and will empower you to make healthier choices. By recognizing the importance of a healthy balanced diet, you will start to learn more about your body and what it needs. Using a recipe organizer will make it easier for you to check the nutrition facts of your meals. And you’ll be on your way to meeting your healthiest self!

RecipeIQ is free to download and has in-app purchases for access to all features.
Get the Facts Right

With this recipe calculator, you can add a recipe from an online source, scan it from a cookbook or magazine, or even add your own recipes. The app will then calculate all the nutritional facts you are looking for:

• Calories
• Fat
• Sugars
• Carbohydrates
• Sodium
• Protein
• Fiber
• And More…

Add, Switch, Save!

This easy-to-use recipe calculator will help transform your home cooking in 3 simple steps:

Add: Snap a photo of any recipe, paste a link to an online recipe, or enter the information of your own recipe manually. The RecipeIQ nutrition calculator app will automatically generate the ingredients and nutrition facts.

Switch: Edit or add ingredients in this recipe organizer to suit your dietary specifications or preferences.

Save: Review the updated nutritional info to ensure compatibility with your dietary needs. Name the recipe something you will remember and add a picture to it – this will remind you of how great the meal was so you can cook it again in the future. The more favorites you save, the easier healthy eating will become, as you build your own personalized virtual cookbook in your recipe analyzer.

Now just go to view mode, and cook with confidence! You can access your recipes whenever, wherever. RecipeIQ will become your go-to recipe calculator while making healthy eating your way of life.

Want to go all the way to super healthy mode? Make use of our new features!

Menu Feature: Create your meal plan for the day and calculate the nutritional value for all the recipes together. 

Sub Recipes: Save your homemade sauces and toppings in RecipeIQ and add them as sub recipes to your meals. 

Reverse Nutrition: Determine which ingredients contribute to each nutritional component. Where is the fat coming from? Why is there so much sodium? Now you can get the answers.

Want to go ad-free and have access to all the features?
Choose our Premium Plan. It’s New!

Upgrade now:

Monthly subscription - $3.99
Annual Subscription - $29.99
One-time purchase - $99.99

Try out the Premium features with our 30 day free trial and cancel anytime.


Find us on social media for healthy recipe inspiration and nutrition tips!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RecipeIQ
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/RecipeIQ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RecipeIQ
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/RecipeIQ

Now just go to view mode, and cook with confidence! You can access your recipes whenever, wherever. RecipeIQ will become your go-to recipe calculator while making healthy eating your way of life.

Want to go all the way to super healthy mode? Make use of our new features!

Menu Feature: Create your meal plan for the day and calculate the nutritional value for all the recipes together.

Sub Recipes: Save your homemade sauces and toppings in RecipeIQ and add them as sub recipes to your meals.

Reverse Nutrition: Determine which ingredients contribute to each nutritional component. Where is the fat coming from? Why is there so much sodium? Now you can get the answers.

Want to go ad-free and have access to all the features?
Choose our Premium Plan. It’s New!

Upgrade now:

Monthly subscription - $3.99
Annual Subscription - $29.99
One-time purchase - $99.99

Try out the Premium features with our 30 day free trial and cancel anytime.


Find us on social media for healthy recipe inspiration and nutrition tips!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RecipeIQ
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/RecipeIQ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RecipeIQ
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/RecipeIQ
summary: A nutrition and recipe calculator for conscious home cooking
recentChanges: Better FAQ section to answer your questions and some bug fixes.
comments: Buggy, sometimes goes back to initial screen instantly after I opt to select an image from the gallery. The app behaves slow for me. I use the newest Android OS. I find the constant quote pop up annoying and I suspect it plays a role in those lags. I think this app would shine if it adds important features: an option to see stats based on food eaten per day etc. + richer nutritional values per ingredient, antioxidants or whatever (I really love data/stats).

I had high hopes for this app. I tested it by inputting recipes with known nutritional values from a well known highly trusted, respected, test kitchen noted for using scientific testing for their recipes. Every recipes I put into the app was off my a significant number of calories. Sometimes off by 50 calories per serving. The idea is nice, but this dramatic difference in results is not helpful for someone who is trying to get a handle on their nutritional intake. ☹️

Love it. I gave it one star initially because I was confused by what the points meant. Now that I know they are WW points, I love this app. I'm doing WW and knowing the point value of a recipe makes the app awesome!

I put in a desert recipe that I make trying to track net carbs and noticed how high the calculation was. That's when I noticed that the sugar alcohols are still included in the main body of carbs and not listed separately for calculation. Everything else was good though.

I LOVE THIS APP!! I have tried multiple sites to try to calculate recipes and this has been by far the easiest and most comprehensive nutrition calculator I have found. I was a little nervous at first because of some of the bad reviews, but I noticed they had released an app update since then, and they are very responsive to reviews so I know they are reading them. I found the app to be very intuitive. I'm also dairy free so I use a lot of substitutions and I had no problem finding those.

title: Fast Food Nutrition & Calorie Count
description:
This app provides info for your favourite fast food restaurant. All you need are available in this app including how much food score, fat, fiber, carbs, protein, sodium etc.

This App also provide food list from most famous fast food restaurant in the US and Canda such as McDonald, Wendy's, Burger king, Chick-fil-a, Dunkin Donut, Subway, Taco Bell, Starbuck and many more.

If You are on diet watchers, you will love this app because its very helpful for you to count calorie in your every meal. Especially for those who had a diabetic, You have to be aware of the carb count for your insulin intake.

If you are on lose weight plan, this app really helpful for you tu count how many calorie every time when you eat out. It also help you to be informed decision about what your meal later on.


App Feature :

⭐️ List of favourite fast food restaurat

⭐️ List menu of every fast food restaurant

⭐️ Calorie Counter

⭐️ Bmi Counter

⭐️ Calculator 

⭐️ Note for you write down important things

⭐️ Food Counter

⭐️ Food score


Start to know every fast food meal you eating everyday. This app will help you to breaks down meals on calories,food score and other nutritional values in each meal. Make a better choice every time you eat out later. Making a healthier diet menu will help your body to shed extra weight.

recentChanges: First Version Fast Food Nutrition & Calorie Count
comments: This app is awesome. The layout is easy to use and the flow is uninterrupted. Going between sections it easy and a breeze. There are hiccups every now and then plus the restaurant selection is limited now to the most common around the states, but Its a new app. I expect the app to get better over time with a larger number of restaurant selections. Then only negative is the ad pop up. I dont mind the banners so much, they are place and fit in the page but occasionally ads pop up when clicking.
Seems useful, but description says permissions can be controlled. I found no such option, so uninstalled. There is a 5 second ad in front of every action.

title: The Keto Calculator
description:
The simplest way to Calculate your macros for the ketogenic diet.
Input your body parameters and get your macros divided by grams of every macronutrient
Set to consume 25 grams of carbohydrates as maximum and you can adjust your protein intake.
NEW FEATURES:
Don't know your body fat? We have you covered now you can press "HELP ME ESTIMATE" and get visual aid to pick the image that reflects you the most.


FEATURES:

- Select the metric system
- Visual aid to estimate body fat
- Input your activity level
- Select your goal (Lose fat, Maintain weight, Gain muscle)

recentChanges: Mostly bug fixes
comments: Quick keto calculator that gives you a quick estimate of how many calories carbs protein and fat you need to lose weight.
Couldn't see whole screen, could see even less in landscape.

I can't even use the app because I have to have my setting on my phone larger due to eye problems and the app doesn't adapt to my settings so I can't see everything on the screen.  Maybe make a version for people with vision problems.
Not feeling it. This app has the words off the screen so as soon as you rotate it to landscape mode, it resets and all info you've previously entered is lost. Delete!
the app is great if your working out your numbers only, but that's all it is Good for. I am using this app to help me on another app, due to it not having a muscle mass calculation itself.

title: Lchf Malayalam
description:
കാര്ബോഹൈഡ്രേറ്റ്സ് (അന്നജം ) അടങ്ങിയ ഭക്ഷണം ഒഴിവാക്കി ഫാറ്റ് ( കൊഴുപ്പ് ) അടങ്ങിയ ഭക്ഷണം സ്ഥിരമാക്കി നമ്മുടെ രോഗങ്ങളെയും രോഗ സാധ്യതയേയും തോൽപ്പിക്കുന്ന ഡയറ്റ് ....ഇത് മൂലം പ്രമേഹം , കോളസ്ട്രോൾ , യൂറിക് ആസിഡ് , തൈറോയിഡ് , പൊണ്ണത്തടി , ഗ്യാസ്‌ട്രബിള് തുടങ്ങി ഒട്ടു മിക്ക രോഗങ്ങളും കുറക്കാൻ കഴിയും.
നമ്മൾ ഇത്രയും കാലം ശരീരത്തിന്റെ ഊർജ്ജത്തിനായി ഗ്ളൂക്കോസ് ആണ് ഉപയോഗിച്ചിരുന്നത്. ഈ ഡയറ്റിൽ ഗ്ളൂക്കോസ് ഇല്ലാത്തതു കാരണം ശരീരം കൊഴുപ്പിനെ ഊർജ്ജമാക്കാനുള്ള ശ്രമത്തിലാണ്. അതിനാൽ ശരീരത്തിലെ കൊഴുപ്പു പെട്ടന്ന് തന്നെ കുറയുകയും പോന്ന തടിയും മറ്റും പെട്ടന്ന് കുറയുന്നു

LCHF Malyalam ആപ്പിൻറ്റെ പ്രത്യേകതകൾ
*റെസിപ്പീസ്- ബ്രേക്ഫാസ്റ്റ്, ബ്രഞ്ച്, സ്നാക്ക്സ്, ലഞ്ച്, ഡിന്നർ, വെജിറ്റേറിയൻ, ഡ്രിങ്ക്സ്, ഈസി മീൽ എനീ ക്യാറ്റഗറികളിലായി വിവിധയിനം റെസിപ്പീസ്
*റെസിപ്പീസ് ആഡ് ട്ടോ ഫേവറൈറ്റ്സ് ചെയ്യാനുള്ള ഓപ്ഷൻ 
 *ന്യൂസ്-Lchf അഥവാ കീറ്റോ ഡയറ്റിനെ കുറിച്ചുള്ള പത്ര മാധ്യമങ്ങളിൽ വരുന്ന വാർത്തകൾ,മറ്റു ആരോഗ്യ വാർത്തകൾ എന്നിവ ഇതിൽ വരുന്നു.
*ചാറ്റ്-ഡയറ്റിനെ കുറിച്ചുളള മാത്രം ചർച്ചകൾക്കായി ഒരു ഓപ്പൺ ചാറ്റ് റൂം സൗകര്യം
*ഗൈഡ് - LCHF ഡയറ്റിനെ സംബന്ധിച്ചുള്ള ഗൈഡ്,ടിപ്സ് എന്നിവ അടങ്ങിയ ഏരിയ.
*സോഷ്യൽ-LCHF ഫേസ്ബുക് പേജ് 
*ഇതിനു പുറമെ ടെലിഗ്രാം,യൂട്യൂബ് ചാനൽ ലിങ്കുകളും ആപ്പിൽ കാണാവുന്നതാണ്
*ഓരോ പുതിയ റെസിപ്പികളും,വാർത്തകളും,പൊടികൈകളും ആഡ് ചെയ്യുമ്പോൾ ഫോണിലേക്കു പുഷ് നോട്ടിഫിക്കേഷൻ വരുന്നതിനുള്ള സൗകര്യവും ഏർപ്പെടുത്തിയിട്ടുണ്ട്

title: Intellin Diabetes Manager, Log & Risk Tracker
description:
Manage your diabetes, for free!

Intellin Diabetes Manager App. Log your diabetes blood pressure, blood sugar, insulin, glucose, activities and more!

Whether you have type 1 or type 2 diabetes, gestational diabetes, or want to track diabetes for a loved one, Intellin is the most comprehensive diabetes management app. The diabetes app empowers you to live well with diabetes and understand your diabetic risks of developing complications.

Track what matters most - blood sugar, blood glucose levels, blood pressure log, insulin dose, activity - all in one diabetes manager app. Intellin® Manage Diabetes provides personalised predictions on your highest diabetes risk areas and provides tips on how to prevent these diabetes complications.

☆ FEATURES☆
• Diabetes log:easily log your blood pressure, activity, body mass index, insulin dose, blood glucose levels and more
• Blood sugar tracker: see and manage blood sugar level trends
• Diabetic risk: understand your highest diabetic risk areas and how to manage them
• Diabetes tracker: get reminders and tips on how to look after your blood pressure, insulin, glucose, diet, exercise, feet, eyes, kidneys and cardiovascular risks
• Manage diabetes: manage your Type 1, Type 2, and gestational diabetes with motivating trends and feedback
• Diabetes management: daily, weekly, monthly and yearly diabetes analysis
• Secure diabetes data backup

☆ PRO FEATURES☆
• Try Intellin® Connect with a free one month trial!
• Connectivity to over 100 devices to track your activity, weight loss, BMI, blood pressure and more. With extra devices to be added to increase your ability to take control of your diabetes today! Easily manage your diabetes.
• Compatible with apps: Fitbit, Garmin, iHealth Labs, Misfit, OMRON, Oura Health, Polar, Strava, Suunto, Withings

The Intellin® Diabetes App was developed in the UK with passion from clinicians and people with diabetes.

SUPPORT

We're always working to make the Intellin® Diabetes Management App better, and we need your feedback! Please get in touch to help us improve the Intellin diabetes app and let us know how we can help people manage it at: hello@gendius.co.uk

Follow us on Twitter @GendiusHealth, Facebook @GendiusMobHealth, Instagram @Gendius_

www.gendius.com
www.Intellin.com
https://www.gendius.co.uk/contact/

title: Keto Diet Plan
description:
I tried to make the keto diet meal plan super simple. Most of the meals can be prepared in 5 minutes (+ cooking time). Photos are for inspiration; you can make the meals as you want. Each meal contains ~350 calories and max. 6 net carbs. So, choose 4 of them every day according to your taste. It means that you can eat a breakfast for lunch or a lunch at dinner time according to your taste and lifestyle. Use your favorite oil and spices for cooking and salads. If you feel hungry after a meal, eat extra zero carb cheese, salami, sausage, snack, etc. 

Wish you a successful weight loss journey.

title: Paleo Diet For Weight loss (2019)
description:
Paleo Diet App Summary

The Paleo diet or more precisely Paleolithic diet is an extremely common weight loss diet plan that has been upheld by fitness enthusiasts and weight conscious people all around the world. It is a sustainable diet plan that helps you to lose weight and keep it away in the long run. The Paleo diet is also known as the Caveman Diet or Hunter-Gatherer Diet. 
This Paleo Diet App gives a complete breakdown of the foods that you can eat for each meal for all the dieting days right from breakfast, lunch, and dinner to snacks. The app has been segregated into 4 basic parts for the comfort level of the dieter - Beginners, Simple, Delicious and Ultra Easy Paleo diets and delicious recipes. 

New Features in App:
* Complete information about Paleo Diet to know it better
* What to eat and what not to eat in Paleo Diet
* Paleo Diet Experiences
* BMI Calculator to check your health level

Why the Paleo Diet Works?

The Paleo diet is based on the food habits of the cavemen or hunter-gatherers who had the lean and muscular physique. Their diet consisted of commonly available foods - plants and animal meat. The same theory is incorporated in the Paleo diet. High fiber and protein-rich foods included in this diet gives you instant results. The best thing is you don't have to starve to death or endure intense hunger pangs while following this diet. You won't require a lot of preparations for the Paleo diet because you will be eating regular foods like fruits, vegetables, meat and grains. 

Objectives and Philosophy of the Paleo Diet:

Achieve sustainable weight loss and maintain healthy BMI ratio
Follow a simple and healthy diet that was followed by our early ancestors
Prevent health conditions like hypertension and arthritis

title: Zero Calories Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast
description:
Intermittent Fasting Tracker. 
Zero Calories - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast is a very light and simple health and fasting timer app. It allows users to modify fasting time and length of the fast, track body weight, body measures, ketones, glucose and body fat.
Diet assistant 
Zero Calories will help you stay on track, remind you to start your fasting and give you suggestions for improve body weight. There are plenty of features that will motivate you to stay on track.
Intermittent Fasting Plans 
There are more intermittent fasting to choose. Advance, beginner, keto, vegan, muscle builder or other. Zero calories can create a custom fasting plan.
Social Intermittent Fasting 
Join our public groups, chat with other fasters and friends. 
Share each other progress and motivation.

Zero Calories tracks what is happening inside your body white fasting. 
We will teach you how and why your body burns fat. 
Zero Calories is your private health and  diet coach.
You can also use group fasting for fast with your friends.

Fasting is an easy diet that do not require much effort. Just follow the timer and do not consume food in the fasting period (Except the food with zero calories). 

After your fasting is over, feel free to consume any food you like. 
However, healthy whole food is always a better choice then processed fast food. 

Main features:

✔ Track fast time
✔ Edit start time
✔ Edit end time
✔ Track weight
✔ Water Tracker 
✔ BMI Tracker
✔ Widget for track time
✔ Compare weight to fast time
✔ Track body measures
✔  Export data to csv
✔ Set notifications for start fast
✔ Set notifications for end fast
✔ Create custom fast time
✔ Create prolonged fasts (up to 40 days)
✔ Sync data with web
✔ Print fast data and weight loss from web
✔ Track ketones
✔ Track glucose
✔ Track body fat
✔ Fast with friends
Intermittent fasting benefits:

✔ CELL REPAIR

During a fast, your body will rid of waste materials inside the cells and dead cells themselves while repairing and rebuilding new stronger cells. 

✔ LONGEVITY AND DISEASE PREVENTION

Gene expression is something that happens where your body experiences changes in genes, cells and molecules directly related to life span and disease prevention.

✔ INSULIN LEVELS

Fasting can help improve insulin sensitivity, which has been shown to help lose more body fat and/or store less body fat from the food taken in.

✔ GROWTH HORMONE BOOST

This can help to regulate body composition, body fluids, muscle and bone growth, sugar and fat metabolism, and possibly heart function. 

✔ TESTOSTERONE

Fasting has been shown to directly bump levels of testosterone in men.

✔ LOSE WEIGHT

All of the above can already help you lose body fat and drop some pounds. But one of the biggest drivers in intermittent fasting that is leading to weight loss is the fact that it’s easier to adhere to a caloric deficit on a daily basis.

✔ METABOLISM INCREASES

Due to the bodies natural hormonal boosts, insulin improvement and survival mechanisms, your metabolism can actually bump up and become faster due to intermittent fasting. 

✔ STRESS AND INFLAMMATION

Intermittent fasting was shown to help improve oxidative stress and inflammation in the body. 

✔ HEART HEALTHY

Some studies were done showing that intermittent fasting may actually help improve cholesterol, triglycerides, blood pressure, and inflammatory markers.

✔ CANCER PREVENTION

Fasting has been shown to help in the regeneration of cells which could be a possible aid in preventing or helping manage cancer.

✔ GUT HEALTH

Intermittent fasting has been shown to help aid the GI tract in digestion and also protect your gut bacteria, both due to the anti-inflammatory benefits of fasting.

Our Website : https://zerocaloriesfasting.com
descriptionHTML:
Intermittent Fasting Tracker

.
Zero Calories - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast is a very light and simple health and fasting timer app. It allows users to modify fasting time and length of the fast, track body weight, body measures, ketones, glucose and body fat.

Diet assistant


Zero Calories will help you stay on track, remind you to start your fasting and give you suggestions for improve body weight. There are plenty of features that will motivate you to stay on track.

Intermittent Fasting Plans


There are more intermittent fasting to choose. Advance, beginner, keto, vegan, muscle builder or other. Zero calories can create a custom fasting plan.

Social Intermittent Fasting


Join our public groups, chat with other fasters and friends.
Share each other progress and motivation.

Zero Calories tracks what is happening inside your body white fasting.
We will teach you how and why your body burns fat.
Zero Calories is your private health and diet coach.
You can also use group fasting for fast with your friends.

Fasting is an easy diet that do not require much effort. Just follow the timer and do not consume food in the fasting period (Except the food with zero calories).

After your fasting is over, feel free to consume any food you like.
However, healthy whole food is always a better choice then processed fast food.

Main features:

✔ Track fast time
✔ Edit start time
✔ Edit end time
✔ Track weight
✔ Water Tracker
✔ BMI Tracker
✔ Widget for track time
✔ Compare weight to fast time
✔ Track body measures
✔ Export data to csv
✔ Set notifications for start fast
✔ Set notifications for end fast
✔ Create custom fast time
✔ Create prolonged fasts (up to 40 days)
✔ Sync data with web
✔ Print fast data and weight loss from web
✔ Track ketones
✔ Track glucose
✔ Track body fat
✔ Fast with friends
Intermittent fasting benefits:

✔ CELL REPAIR

During a fast, your body will rid of waste materials inside the cells and dead cells themselves while repairing and rebuilding new stronger cells.

✔ LONGEVITY AND DISEASE PREVENTION

Gene expression is something that happens where your body experiences changes in genes, cells and molecules directly related to life span and disease prevention.

✔ INSULIN LEVELS

Fasting can help improve insulin sensitivity, which has been shown to help lose more body fat and/or store less body fat from the food taken in.

✔ GROWTH HORMONE BOOST

This can help to regulate body composition, body fluids, muscle and bone growth, sugar and fat metabolism, and possibly heart function.

✔ TESTOSTERONE

Fasting has been shown to directly bump levels of testosterone in men.

✔ LOSE WEIGHT

All of the above can already help you lose body fat and drop some pounds. But one of the biggest drivers in intermittent fasting that is leading to weight loss is the fact that it’s easier to adhere to a caloric deficit on a daily basis.

✔ METABOLISM INCREASES

Due to the bodies natural hormonal boosts, insulin improvement and survival mechanisms, your metabolism can actually bump up and become faster due to intermittent fasting.

✔ STRESS AND INFLAMMATION

Intermittent fasting was shown to help improve oxidative stress and inflammation in the body.

✔ HEART HEALTHY

Some studies were done showing that intermittent fasting may actually help improve cholesterol, triglycerides, blood pressure, and inflammatory markers.

✔ CANCER PREVENTION

Fasting has been shown to help in the regeneration of cells which could be a possible aid in preventing or helping manage cancer.

✔ GUT HEALTH

Intermittent fasting has been shown to help aid the GI tract in digestion and also protect your gut bacteria, both due to the anti-inflammatory benefits of fasting.

Our Website : https://zerocaloriesfasting.com
