comments: Postive: Good to track intermittent fasting hours. Keeps you honest and its good to have a visual countdown. You can also set your own personal goal eg 13hrs. Negative: Can be hard to navigate. LOTS of ads, which are frustrating, including asking me to rate the app. My response to your reply (copied below) is: My point is it's frustrating that you can't use the app without responding to your review requests. Your response to my feedback - you ask me to increase my rating of your app to 5 stars. I've now decreased it. Your reply - Hi Carolyn, the ads keep the app free, but you can remove them for a extra small amount (one cup of coffee). Also by rating the app, you help us to acquire more users which can increase our budget for new free cool features :D If you can consider to give us a 5 star review, could be awesome, thanks. My point is it's frustrating that you can't use the app without loads of ads and responding to your review requests. Your response... you ask me to increase my rating of your app to 5stars.

A bit heavy on the ads, but I do expect ads on the free version. Otherwise, this app has everything I've been looking for for fasting tracking. Love that it let's me track all my measurements along with weight. Can measure glucose and ketone levels if I want. I've been fasting for a while and wanted to find an app that would let me enter old fasts. It could be smoother for allowing this, but it does let me edit times and dates for my fasts so I've been able to enter old fasts. Can customize too!

Easy to log info and clear displays. I like the idea of choice of time counting upward or count down. Developer even replied to my previous rating to explain my mistake. Now gave 5 stars as I've tried others and there's more adverts or have to pay. This app is the best in my opinion.

Not a bad fasting app, but the BMI calculator is wrong. I like that you can track body measurements, but it would be nice if they added a female body. Edit to add- my units are all correct. Looking again, it looks like the app IS showing the right number at the top of the screen, but the graph is showing it 6 units higher
It doesn't freeze up and it tells you what your body is suppose to be doing at certain levels. But, I'm not sure how to share this app with other faster. I've tried and I just don't see it.

Your calories are replenished throughout the day and night, just like your body.  They do not reset at midnight like other trackers.  However, you still have the option to track your calories the classic way.

Carbon Calorie Counter takes a simplistic approach.  None of your nutrients are tracked - just calories.  It is all about weight loss.

Carbon Calorie Counter is designed with aesthetic appeal in mind.  The beautiful visuals give the app a pleasant feel.

No registration required.

Lose weight.  It's simple.

comments: I want to like it. But it's hard to justify paying for a simple feature like finding food items. From my search history in the app, it looks like you get precisely 11 items. Which is insanely low. This app has a lot going for it (Google Fit and Samsung Health integration would be nice to keep weight in sync though), but I feel I can't justify supporting an app model where you need to pay to make more than a dozen searches ever. This review was made on my fourth day using the app.
It's great! Simple calorie count. It lets you set your own calories per day lower than recommend if you want! love the look of it don't change that!
Simple, engaging format without the bells and whistles. I only wish it would connect to google fit or other tracking devices.
Fantastic Weight watcher, makes the entire thing a fun activity! Love the design! Highly recommend!

Not very intuitive. I love the look, but what a pain to try and enter food data. Just can't pay for an app that I spend so much time trying to figure out. Really wanted to like it... but I really did not. Would love to be able to add macros and customize serving sizes. I am afraid I just don't subscribe to "a calorie is a calorie".

title: TrackEats
description:
Any program can ask you to follow a strict diet plan and to track your calorie intake.
 
But TrackEats is different.
 
Discover how tracking small habits can make a big difference in becoming happier and healthier. Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet, you’ll love TrackEats. 
 
Our team of world-class nutritionists, trainers and diet specialists have developed a diet program that focuses on effective behavioural change to help you reach your health and weight goals through better eating. You’ll also get a customized meal plan that is built and tailored to your lifestyle that is realistic and sustainable (That works!) Say goodbye to unrealistic diet programs with TrackEats.
 
Get access to the tools to transform your body and get you fitter, stronger, healthier and happy today!

How are we different? 

1. Stop dieting
 
This is not your low calorie, restrictive diet program. Pick the meal of your choice from a delicious menu, and you won’t be going hungry again. Ditch the idea of “good” foods and “bad” foods and develop a healthier relationship with food. Premium users will get access to our 10,000+ incredible recipes tailored to your preference, including dishes like burgers, tacos, pancakes and other favourites.
 
 
2. Tailored meal plan that works for you 
 
No two meal plans are alike; Start by telling us about your health goal and preferred journey. With the help of our machine learning technology and our nutritionist and diet specialist TrackEats will build you a customized meal plan for you to achieve your goals in the fastest and healthiest way possible.
 
3. Build better habits

Stop focusing on quick fixes and diet trends! Trackeats focuses on habit building and behavioural change to help you develop sustainable healthy habits to reach your goals and to keep it there! You will develop a healthy relationship between mind, body and food by the end of this program. 

What you’ll get
 
- Work with our nutrition team to get your customized meal program and get support from our community of experts 
- Get access to 1000+ tasty yet healthy recipes on our database
- Net carb tracking to help you stay on course and below daily limits if you’re following a Keto diet
-Body measurement tracking (weight, waist, body fat, chest, arm, BMI) - excellent tools for tracking your progression to health
- Step up your calorie tracking habits with our macronutrient tracking that focuses on heart health
-Detailed nutritional information (potassium, sodium, fiber, added sugar, saturated fat, unsaturated fat, and cholesterol), so you know you’re hitting the daily recommendations
- Track your daily habits with water and calories burn 
- Understand the science of weight loss
- Understand how other lifestyle habits like sleep, self-care, and life balance that impact your wellbeing
- Save your favourites – create and save foods, recipes, meals, and exercise
- Import and export your nutrition data, exercise data, and weight and body measurements to and from the Apple Health app
- … and so much more!

title: Walk Tracker - Step Counter Free & Calorie Burner
description:
This pedometer uses the built-in sensor to count your steps. No GPS tracking, so it can extremely save battery. It also tracks your water intake.

Just press the start button and it will automatically start tracking your steps, burning calories, walking distance and time. All of this information will be visually displayed graphically. Easy to use!


Keep Healthy
Do you want to have a healthier lifestyle? We can help you learn more about yourself every day. Even if you don't open the pedometer, you can see your progress anytime.    
Drink reminder
We will remind you to drink water in time and track the statistics of your drink! We will also help you to develop a good habit, so that you can do without constant reminders in the future!

Daily Goal
The various achievements of the pedometer are good self-motivation to achieve the daily goal. You can set your goals freely according to your actual height and weight, and then start a more active life!

Save Power
Don't worry about power consumption, this pedometer uses the built-in sensor to count your steps. No GPS tracking, and you can pause or start it any time to save power.

Daily Performance Report 
Report calories, time and distance with clear charts. We accurately analyze calorie consumption based on data, which can help you manage your body scientifically.

Start, Pause and Reset 
You can pause and start step counting at any time to save power. The pedometer will stop background-refreshing statistics once you pause it.

Additional instructions 
● To ensure the accuracy of step counting, please input your correct information in settings, because it will be used to calculate your walking distance and calories.
● You can adjust sensitivity to make pedometer count steps more accurately.
● Because of the device power saving processing, some devices stop counting steps when the screen is locked.

title: Keto diet plan and recipe
description:
A keto diet is well known for being a low carb diet, where the body produces ketones in the liver to be used as energy. It’s referred to as many different names – ketogenic diet, low carb diet, low carb high fat (LCHF), etc. When you eat something high in carbs, your body will produce glucose and insulin.

Glucose is the easiest molecule for your body to convert and use as energy so that it will be chosen over any other energy source. Insulin is produced to process the glucose in your bloodstream by taking it around the body. Since the glucose is being used as a primary energy, your fats are not needed and are therefore stored. Typically on a normal, higher carbohydrate diet, the body will use glucose as the main form of energy. By lowering the intake of carbs, the body is induced into a state known as ketosis.

Ketosis is a natural process the body initiates to help us survive when food intake is low. During this state, we produce ketones, which are produced from the breakdown of fats in the liver. The end goal of a properly maintained keto diet is to force your body into this metabolic state. We don’t do this through starvation of calories but starvation of carbohydrates.

Our bodies are incredibly adaptive to what you put into it – when you overload it with fats and take away carbohydrates, it will begin to burn ketones as the primary energy source. Optimal ketone levels offer many health, weight loss, physical and mental performance benefits.

Benefits of a Ketogenic Diet.
There are numerous benefits that come with being on keto: from weight loss and increased energy levels to therapeutic medical applications. Most anyone can safely benefit from eating a low-carb, high-fat diet. Below, you’ll find a short list of the benefits you can receive from a ketogenic diet. 

The ketogenic recipes that have been prepared in this app are pure coming from ketogenic diet ingredients. These recipes are not only easy to cook but taste well as well. You'll be guided to find the ingredients and keep them on hand. If you plan ahead and pre-decide your meals, following the keto diet won’t be difficult. You have to be able to resist temptation. Be patient and you will definitely notice positive results in no time. Also, this diet helps you in losing fat from the abdominal region. Inside we collected only best of the best Ketogenic recipes for: Breakfast Main dishes, Lunch Side dishes, Desserts, Snacks, and appetizers.

title: Low Carb Diabetes Diet
description:
A low-carb diabetes diet can help people with diabetes better manage their blood sugar levels.

Carbohydrates or carbs raise blood glucose more than other foods, meaning the body must produce more insulin to digest them.

Reducing carb intake can help stabilize blood glucose. It may also counteract some other effects of diabetes, such as weight gain and heart disease.

Despite this, low-carb diabetes diets also carry some risks, including vitamin and mineral deficiencies. For some people, low-carb diabetes diets are challenging to stick to over time.

In this apps, learn more about a low-carb diet for people with diabetes. People should remember to speak to a doctor before making significant dietary changes, especially ones that affect diabetes management.

Keywords :
- What is diabetes, and what role does food play
- Can Low-Carb diets help manage diabetes

descriptionHTML:
A low-carb diabetes diet can help people with diabetes better manage their blood sugar levels.

Carbohydrates or carbs raise blood glucose more than other foods, meaning the body must produce more insulin to digest them.

Reducing carb intake can help stabilize blood glucose. It may also counteract some other effects of diabetes, such as weight gain and heart disease.

Despite this, low-carb diabetes diets also carry some risks, including vitamin and mineral deficiencies. For some people, low-carb diabetes diets are challenging to stick to over time.

In this apps, learn more about a low-carb diet for people with diabetes. People should remember to speak to a doctor before making significant dietary changes, especially ones that affect diabetes management.

title: The Low-Glycal Diet™ by BioFit
description:
What’s the best way to lose weight? Should you reduce the total number of calories in your diet or lower the total glycemic load? There is scientific evidence to support both approaches, so which one should you follow? Well, it turns out that both are important!

Everyone knows that calories are important, but not everyone knows that when you eat those calories you can do three things with them: burn them for energy; store them as fat; or use them to build lean body mass.

What you do with those calories is determined by hormones in your body, the most important being insulin. Your insulin level is determined not only by the number of calories you eat, but also by the type of calories you eat. 

This is why what you eat (glycemic load) is as important as how much you eat (calories)!

The Low-Glycal Diet™ app by BioFit uses both glycemic load and calories to calculate the number of “glycals” in a meal, which is a better predictor of how fattening that meal will be. 

The “glycal” is calculated from a formula developed by Dr. Jeffrey S. Dunham, M.D., Ph.D., M.P.H., medical director of BioFit Medical Group and graduate of Harvard Medical School, and is based on the latest medical research. 

The total number of glycals in a meal equals the total number of calories in a meal that will be stored as fat.

The Low-Glycal Diet™ app by BioFit contains over 1000 easy-to-find foods which are color coded as green (low-glycal), yellow (medium-glycal), or red (high-glycal) if eaten alone. 

You assemble a meal by choosing the individual foods in that meal. The app then calculates the total number of glycals in that meal and gives you a green, yellow or red result. 

The number of glycals will change depending on how you pair foods together. For example, eating two fried eggs (a green food) with two slices of cheddar cheese (a green food) will give you a green meal, but eating two fried eggs with two slices of dry whole wheat toast (a green food) will give you a red meal. 

The ranges of green, yellow and red also change depending on when you have the meal, since eating carbohydrates after 6PM can be more fattening than eating them in earlier in the day.

You never have to be hungry on The Low-Glycal Diet™ by BioFit. You can have all the green meals you want in a day, as long as they are separated by two hours. You’re allowed one yellow meal a day and one red meal a week. 

The fat loss is almost effortless, so start losing fat today!

title: 90-Day Diet & Break
description:
90-Day Diet is also known as diet “Rina 90” or Rina’s Diet. It is published for the first time in 2000 as a guide to food separation diet and food combining diet from Rina magazine. Since then has undergone many changes, based on the experience of the people, obeyed the regime. Its popularity is due to the fact that it helps to loose weight without starvation and deprivation of the body of important nutrients.
The diet relies on the principles of food combining and the principles of rotation of carbohydrates (carb cycling) by regulating and boosting the metabolism. Thanks to that maximum results are achieved.
Very good results are observed in people suffering from diseases of the thyroid gland, but it is important to exclude from their menu the contraindication foods.

title: Lowcal: Diet Planner, Food Diary, Activity Tracker
description:
Personalized diet & meal plans, workout plans, licensed nutritionists, food tracker, and activity diary all in Lowcal app!

Lowcal App is a simple and comprehensive diet and workout planner. It brings valuable nutrition insights in just one tap, as well as makes it quick and easy to track everything that matters most in a weight loss journey. Our Premium Subscriptions start from $7 per month.

Fast and easy food tracking

1. Vast Food Database that contains tens of thousands of foods and meals
2. Food Insights which will help in making healthier food choices
3. Calorie Counter that calculates calories in foods, meals and recipes automatically
4. Nutrients Tracking makes it easier to track fat, protein, and carbs intake automatically
5. Personalized Diary that keeps track of logged breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and other meals too
6. Water Tracking can be challenging, so our tracker helps making it easier and faster

Goal Setting

1. Program: We support programs that include; lose weight, build muscle, eat healthy, and more
2. Goal: Lowcal app helps creating the suitable personalized goal for each body type
3. Habits: With the support of Lowcal Nutritionists, habits can be improved dramatically

Activity Tracking

1. Over 250 fat burning workout plans and exercises are demonstrated in videos
2. The app can keep track of exercises, feelings, body analysis, and body measurements
3. Steps are just another important performance indicator that should be tracked

Get the motivation you need

1. Lowcal Community gives all the motivation, support, tips, and advice
2. Our Nutritionists who give all insights and support that are needed

Lowcal Free Account gives:

1. A Classic Diet which is a good starting point towards a healthier lifestyle
2. Access to food library which contains detailed nutritional information
3. Easy tracking of macros (carbs, proteins, and fats) and water
4. Calorie counting to increase awareness of daily calorie intake
5. Daily rating based on daily food intake (calories and macros)
6. Easier body weight and measurements tracking
7. Tracking of daily habits; water, sports, steps, and more
8. English and Arabic app interfaces

For extended features, Lowcal Premium provides:

1. Wide variety of Diets; Ketogenic, Atkins, Paleo, Intermittent Fasting, Vegan, Vegetarian, Balanced, etc.
2. Short Meal Plans that include; Rapid Weight Loss, Sugar Detox, Body Cleansing, DASH Plan, etc.
3. Access to our vast recipe library in addition to recipe suggestions for assigned daily meals
4. Workout Plans that improve metabolism, all doable at home and require no equipment
5. Smart Body Analyzer which measures BMI, Fat, Visceral Fat, Subcutaneous Fat, Muscle Mass, and more

Lowcal Premium Subscription Packages can be 3, 6, or 12 months. Subscriptions do not renew automatically. Instead of auto-renewal, users will have to buy a new subscription package.

title: Diabetic Diet Plan
description:
A perfect diet plan for diabetic patient! This app gives diabetic patients a hustle free, medicine free life 

For a diabetic patient, Diet is important. Foods for diabetics are a very big problem for a diabetic patient. So, we made this easy for them. Our Diabetic Diet Plan app is the one stop solution for them. He or she doesn’t have to search recipes and food options here and there. Now by only one click he or she can get everything they want. 

 Diabetic Diet Plan app is an app which can guide you that what type of food in what amount you should take to balance your system.  
 Methods used by the App

There are some methods in the application which is followed for deciding that which food you should take by what amount. The methods are like the plate method, Carb -counting, Diabetes Exchange System, Glycemic index. The perfect method of diet and the best diabetic diet will help you to maintain the glucose and cholesterol content in blood and also it helps to maintain the blood pressure. All these things help you to stay fit and well.

 Healthy Diet for diabetic patient

For a diabetic patient, a healthy diet should contain more fruits and vegetables. Mainly green vegetables are very much preferable to them.Along with that whole grains, Low-fat dairy products, fish, and poultry products are also good for them.

 Food you should avoid if you are a diabetic patient

There are some foods to avoid with diabetes also. If you are a diabetic patient you should not eat any processed meat as they contain high sodium which affects the blood pressure. In grain avoid white flour, white bread, pasta, noodles etc. Avoid starchy vegetables like corn, potato, pea and a high-fat dairy product like butter, cheese etc. Don’t eat canned fruits, syrup etc as they contained high in sugar.

Diabetic Diet Plan app contains:

•	20 Worst Foods For Diabetics

title: Atkins Diet
description:
The Atkins diet is a kind of low-carbohydrate fad diet. It was inspired by a low-carbohydrate approach published by Alfred W. Pennington, based on research Pennington did during World War II at DuPont.The Atkins diet is promoted with questionable claims that carbohydrate restriction is the "key" to weight loss.

In his early books such as Dr Atkins' New Diet Revolution, Atkins made the controversial argument that the low-carbohydrate diet produces a metabolic advantage because "burning fat takes more calories so you expend more calories". He cited one study in which he estimated this advantage to be 950 Calories (4.0 MJ) per day. A review study published in Lancet concluded that there was no such metabolic advantage and dieters were simply eating fewer calories. Astrup stated, "The monotony and simplicity of the diet could inhibit appetite and food intake." David L. Katz has characterized Atkins' claim as nonsense.

Net carbohydrates can be calculated from a food source by subtracting fiber and sugar alcohols from total carbohydrates. Sugar alcohols contain about two calories per gram, although the American Diabetes Association recommends that diabetics not count alcohol as carbohydrates. Fructose (for example, as found in many industrial sweeteners) has four calories per gram but has a very low glycemic index and does not cause insulin production, probably because β cells have low levels of GLUT5. Leptin, an appetite-regulating hormone, is not triggered following consumption of fructose. This may for some create an unsatisfying feeling after consumption which might promote binge behavior that culminates in an increased blood triglyceride level arising from fructose conversion by the liver.

Preferred foods in all categories are whole, unprocessed foods with a low glycemic index, although restrictions for low glycemic carbohydrates (black rice, vegetables, etc.) are the same as those for high glycemic carbohydrates (sugar, white bread). Atkins Nutritionals, the company formed to market foods that work with the diet, recommends that no more than 20% of calories eaten while on the diet come from saturated fat.

More feature;

# Benefits Atkins Diet

title: Recipe Calendar - Meal Planner
description:
This meal planner saves your time cooking! It's easy to use: choose a meal plan, go shopping with a grocery list, and cook your meals using step-by-step directions. You'll like our foods! Want something special for dinner? Find a better recipe and update your today's meals.

Choose a weekly plan which best fits you by complexity and style. Our healthy diets include low-carb, vegetarian, low-calorie, and even paleo menus. Decide how many people will eat and which meals will they have, and update your schedule as appropriate. Have any dietary restrictions? Recipe Calendar remembers them and recommends you only safe recipes.

If you're a beginner cook, use a simple menu with well-known dishes: eggplant with bacon, chicken broth, or fried pork with noodles. Want something more interesting? Use complex suggestions and taste outstanding recipes provided by best cooks in the world!

Care about health, fitness, and losing weight? Choose one of our diets for weight loss and follow it - the fitness meal plans are based on the real nutrition statistics collected by a calorie counter app. The weight loss statistics proves: followers of our healthy diet plans definitely lose pounds!

Can't find anything attractive among predefined menus? Use the planner to schedule your weekly meals yourself. Recipe Calendar includes more than 5000 recipes: simple, dietary, vegetarian, low-calorie, children, and much more! You can even create your own recipe, use it in your future menus, and share it with thousands of other users. 

Here are more great features of Recipe Calendar:

Selecting meals $2 or less per serving and ready in 20 minutes. Is that ever possible? Recipe Calendar is the only app which estimates the recipe price and provides you with frugal recipes. Other possible selection options are the cooking time, diet preferences, and meal type.

Your meal plans and favorites are synchronized across all your devices. Use a phone to go shopping, and tablet for meal prep. Your data are stored on the server and won't never be lost.

200K community of meal planners. Recipe Calendar is a social and community-driven app. Find friends and share recipes and meal plans with them, or become a contributor and add your own recipes or plans to the project database. 

Install Recipe Calendar now, save your precious time for the choice of dishes, and plan your diet with us!

comments: This app has so much promise but falls short in one important area. I cannot get any recipes I've tried to import via URL. If the import function for adding recipes worked, it would be 5 stars. Without the ability to import recipes via URL, I cannot continue my subscription.

Great way to find new recipes and do meal planning! I enjoy trying different recipes 😋 I wish it would allow me to copy and paste so I can add my variations right on the recipes, to make it more personalized.

I have been searching for a good meal planning app for years and this is the best I have found so far. I wish they allowed you to change plans through the week (for instance I would like to have the vegetarian plan on Fridays and the Restaurant plan on Sundays) but it does allow you to search for a recipe that fits your needs. Also it would be nice to be able to plan more then one week ahead. I live very rural and need to plan out my weeks meals ahead of time.

I'm really on the fence about this app. On one hand, I like the weekly planning thing. But I spent more than a half hour trying to make it respond to any loading or synchronizing, and I couldn't find a way to edit the create a plan. I had a few things saved in favorites but they never showed up in create a plan. On the other hand, I don't like to get a tastey idea in my head only to lose the page because it wouldn't load. I find it hard to want to keep an app when the only way I can choose the option to meal plan for children is to pay 6$/mo. Purchase the full version, sure. But not a subscription. I have 4 people eating in my household. Two of them are 3, two of them are adults. I am not paying a subscription for ideas on dishes for toddlers. I'm also not in this app to read 5 pages of blogs just to look at the recipes to see if i have the ingredients or time to cook the dishes. If i wanted to read blogs, i would. I don't care why Judy started to cook with coconut oil. I just want to see what the recipe is. End of story.

Good concept but not enough recipes. I purchased this app thinking I would have several weeks of healthy meal plans but there are only 2 weeks of that plan and I don't care for much on the menu for week 2. Also, some of the recipes are not very healthy at all and were on the weight loss meal plan. Some recipes are incomplete and lack cooking times or proper measurements. The best part is the ability to create a shopping list from the meal plan you make. Looking forward to app improvements.

title: RP Diet Coach
description:
Get in the best shape of your life by planning what you eat with a diet coach in your pocket. Designed by top PhDs and Registered Dietitians to transform your body, the RP Diet Coach will help you look and perform your best. 
 
What You Get:

 • Personalized macro breakdowns based on your body and fitness goals.
 • Meal timing recommendations that will help you maximize results, decrease hunger, and maintain muscle. 
 • Diet filters including Dairy-Free, Vegetarian, Vegan, Paleo, Gluten-Free, Grain-Free, and Low FODMAP.
 • Smart scheduling accommodates all schedules - including night shift and intermittent fasting.
 • Meal prep made easy with our automatic shopping list made from your food choices.
 • Weekly diet review - recommends changes to your diet based on your progress and goals.
 • Food database of over 750,000 foods and constantly growing.
 • Barcode scanner and restaurant search - mostly US, but more international foods coming soon!
 
How It Works:

 • Enter your info and choose your fitness goal: lose fat, gain muscle, or maintain your weight.
 • You choose your foods - the app tells you how much and when to eat.
 • Every week, review your progress and the app will recommend an updated plan for the next week.
 • Get results!
 
 
With thousands of 5-star reviews (world-wide) and a free 14-day trial, now's the time to get on the right path to finally reach your health and fitness goals!
 
Who We Are:

RP is a group of leading sport scientists, dietitians, and coaches with a proven track record of amazing results with hundreds of thousands of members across the world, including countless pounds lost. After years of diet and nutrition coaching, we've used the data and results from this to create the cutting-edge algorithm that powers the RP Diet Coach App.
  
If you purchase a RP Diet Coach subscription, please note billing and charges are done through your Google Play account and auto-renewed based on your subscription term. At the end of the term, unless auto-renewable subscriptions are disabled, your subscription will automatically renew in your Google Play account. You will be charged for the regular price of your subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current term. Your subscription can be managed or cancelled in your Google Play Account Settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/privacy-policy

Terms of Service:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/terms-of-use

title: 1000 Calories Diet Plan
description:
When you're on a low-calorie diet, you usually get between 800 and 1,500 calories a day. For some people, an alternative for short-term weight loss is a very low-calorie diet.

Many very low-calorie diets are commercially-made formulas of 800 calories or fewer that replace all the food you usually eat. Others, such as the well-known grapefruit diet (also called the Hollywood Diet), rely on eating a lot of the same low-calorie food or foods.

Very low-calorie diets are not the same as over-the-counter meal replacements, which you substitute for one or two meals a day.

Topics:
# Very Low-Calorie Diets: What You Need to Know
# Are Very Low-Calorie Diets Safe? 
# Diet Plan 1
# Diet Plan 2

# Diet Plan 10
descriptionHTML:
When you're on a low-calorie diet, you usually get between 800 and 1,500 calories a day. For some people, an alternative for short-term weight loss is a very low-calorie diet.

Many very low-calorie diets are commercially-made formulas of 800 calories or fewer that replace all the food you usually eat. Others, such as the well-known grapefruit diet (also called the Hollywood Diet), rely on eating a lot of the same low-calorie food or foods.

Very low-calorie diets are not the same as over-the-counter meal replacements, which you substitute for one or two meals a day.

Topics:
# Very Low-Calorie Diets: What You Need to Know
# Are Very Low-Calorie Diets Safe?
# Diet Plan 1
# Diet Plan 2
# Diet Plan 3
# Diet Plan 4
# Diet Plan 5
# Diet Plan 6
# Diet Plan 7
# Diet Plan 8
# Diet Plan 9
# Diet Plan 10

title: 21 Days Keto Diet Weight Loss Meal Plan & Recipes
description:
21 Days Keto Diet Weight Loss Meal plan recipes free app provides the best Ketogenic Diet low carb recipes and custom keto diet plan on the go for free. Make your own weight loss keto meal plan with over 300+ of various tastes and delicious recipes to choose from with easy cooking instructions.

 This keto diet plan free recipe app will help you to achieve your desired weight loss and improve your health. This app's simple keto diet plan is perfect for a beginner because it teaches you the fundamental techniques of cooking keto recipes free. If you are interested in the Atkins Diet recipes or Paleo diet recipes, then this 21 Days Keto Diet Weight Loss Meal plan recipes free app might be perfect for you as well since the macronutrient breakdowns are similar between them.

Are you on a keto diet for weight loss and Looking for delicious and easy Low Carb, Keto Recipes free? Then You have come to the right place, this keto diet plan for weight loss app has 21 days weight loss keto meal plan with lots of easy keto diet recipes with full nutrition details. Find the best free keto diet plan for weight loss and get many easy Keto recipes that are low in carbs and high in fat, those recipes will make your ketogenic diet easier and simpler. Each recipe contains step-by-step cooking instructions and a nutrition facts label with a simple user interface.



KETO DIET APP & LOW CARB RECIPE FEATURES:

• 350+ Easy delicious Keto Recipes free
• Custom Keto Meal Plans - tailored to you
• Truly Low Carb - our macro tracker includes total or net carbs to make your low carb diet even easier to follow.
• Favorites Section - so you can jump straight to the keto and low carb recipes you need.
• Shopping List – add ingredients from keto recipes or your ingredients.


WHAT IS THE KETO DIET?

As we know, The Keto diet is a low carb diet, a high-fat diet also known as a ketogenic diet, low carb high fat (LCHF), etc. In this diet our body produces ketones in the liver to be used as energy which makes it great for weight loss. Besides, according to a lot of studies, it helps control blood sugar, increase mental focus, improve triglyceride levels and cholesterol levels and reduce risk factors for diabetes, heart diseases, stroke, Alzheimer’s, epilepsy, and more.

What is Ketosis?

Ketosis is the result of following the standard ketogenic diet, which is why it’s also sometimes called “the ketosis diet.” Ketosis takes place when glucose from carbohydrate foods (like grains, all sources of sugar or fruit, for example) is drastically reduced, which forces the body to find an alternative fuel source, like fat. It’s also your body’s second preferred source of energy when carbohydrates are not easily accessible.

How to use this plan:
1. Each day will be between 1,500-1,700 calories (designed for weight
loss).
2. This meal plan is designed for 1 person. If you would like to use them
for multiple people, simply multiply the ingredient quantities by the
total number of people.
3. Be flexible! You will find lots of alternative keto recipes free to replace any of the recipes or ingredients with
your personal choices and adjust the ingredient amounts to fit your
macros and situation.

Find the Best ketogenic recipes that have been prepared in this keto diet app that is made from ketogenic diet ingredients. These keto recipes are not only easy to cook but delicious and tasty as well. If you need a 21-day keto diet meal plan then following these simple keto apps free recipes, weight loss won’t be difficult. Inside we collected only the best of the best keto recipes free by the categories of ket Breakfast, Main dishes, keto Lunch, Side dishes, keto Desserts, keto drinks, and keto dinner and many more.

Download this 21 Days Keto Diet Weight Loss Meal plan recipes free app has various types of keto diet recipes. like, keto breakfast, keto instant pot recipes, keto basic, ketosis diet and many more types of recipe with step by step easy cooking instructions.

title: Natural Remedies: healthy life, food and beauty
description:
Love nature and find in nature your wellness. The health app for your healthy life, with healthy recipes, healthy food, herbal teas, health tips for natural beauty and skincare. But it does not end here, in fact you can also read lot of recipes of natural cosmetics and the latest news from science about nutrition and healthy natural life.

Toothache, insomnia, acne as well as nausea are just some of the illnesses that can be treated with natural methods without the overuse of medicines. Nature can be really a useful help.

Natural remedies such as herbal tea, essential oils, mother tinctures, antiwrinkle natural cosmetics and glycerin macerate act slowly, require patience but they can be very helpful and do not have the collateral effects related to medicines.

This health app, easy and fast, is a handbook of the natural remedies for the most common diseases, a book of healthy recipes, a place where you can find tips for a healthy life, for your skincare, to get healthy and stay healthy

The app for your natural wellness is structured as follows:

NATURAL REMEDIES
A list of plants, fruits and essential oils with explanations about uses, properties and benefits.

PROBLEMS AND DISEASES
List of the most common illnesses (allergy, poor digestion, acne, joint pain,  nausea, anxiety, wrinkles and much more) with the related natural remedies.

HEALTHY RECIPES & HEALTHY DIET & HEALTHY FOOD
Every week one healthy recipe to keep you fit and healthy with taste. Enjoy the yummy healthy food.

YOGA EXERSICES
For the flexibility of the body and the calm of mind. Yoga for the back, for the sciatica, to detox the body, for beginners and advanced.

HEALTHY NEWS FROM SCIENCE
Last news from science world: the most recent scientific studies about lifestyle, wellness, nutrition and health are reported.

SMALL NATURAL TIPS & TRICKS
Small and health tips and tricks for every day: short video tutorials that show you how to prepare at home simple natural remedies and natural cosmetics for your skincare and beauty, antiwrinkle lotions, lip gloss for cracked lips, golden milk, remedy for swollen legs.

CRHOMOTHERAPY
This section is based on the color-method to induce relax before bed. 

RELAX AREA
Enjoy the nature with sounds and calming music to relax your mind and body. 


Some topics that you can find on the app Natural Remedies are: information and application about Aloe Vera, how to prepare the Golden Milk, but also the green tee Matcha. You can read also the properties of turmeric, find out the essential oils that you can use against anxiety or depression. Do you have friends for lunch? Maybe you can find interesting the cake without butter or the healthy recipes for every day. In addition to this, you can also learn how to prepare DIY beauty cosmetics also in case of acne or wrinkles. Finally you can learn about eye health tips, healthy eating tips or healthy hair tips



Disclaimer
This app is not a substitute for professional medical or health advice, examination, diagnosis, or treatment. This app disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information.

Upset stomach, in general just wanting to b healthy. It's a great app. At least for me it is. It's worth it to check out if ur into stuff like this

The site is amazing from A to Z and then some. It goes far beyond my expectations, especially considering it's free! It's a plethora of information ! Not to mention the advertisements are minimal and not intrusive ! 100% recommend this app

title: Keyto - Keto Tracker + Diet
description:
Keyto is the lifestyle program that will help you lose weight, feel energized, and sleep better. Developed by world renown weight loss and metabolism experts, the program includes a scientifically backed food program along with the Keyto breath sensor.

The Keyto Program:
- Eat satisfying foods until full
- Don't feel restricted
- No calorie counting or food weighing necessary

The Keyto Device:
- Breathe into the device to know exactly how you are doing
- Get instant feedback on how your metabolism is working
- Keep your number up and naturally lose weight

The App:
- Track your scores and weight
- Access all the resources you need to succeed
- Connect with others on the program

By combining the Keyto device with this App, you will be empowered to reach your health goals in the most effortless, enjoyable and natural way possible.

Subscription pricing and terms:

Keyto offers an auto-renewing monthly subscription at $14.99/month and an auto-renewing yearly subscription at $95.99/year to provide you with unlimited access to the Keyto Premium collection while you maintain an active subscription.

Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after the purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription, where applicable.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:
Terms of service: https://getkeyto.com/terms
Privacy policy: https://getkeyto.com/privacy

developerAddress:
1015 Fillmore St.
PMB 92845
San Francisco, CA 94115
recentChanges: Bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: I had been relatively pleased with the device and app. My wife who is a high carb person blows a "1" on the device, and I use her as the test case for seeing if the device gives false positive results :-) However, yesterday the app changed and now the ketosis range/resolution was reduced even further than the previous barely adequate 8 "Levels". Now it tops out as a "6+" where previously I was routinely in the 7 and 8 ranges in the evening/morning. AND it went back and modified the graph results and changed the Y axis on the scale to only go to 7, where it used to go to 8. I don't want even lower resolution range of ketosis measurements. This was a poor decision and you moved in the wrong direction... If anything I want MORE resolution. If you want to dicker with things then increase resolution by adding decimal points to the nominal results (6.9,7.0, 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, etc) or better yet just give us the raw results without the goofy arbitrary scaling that you evidently aren't even going to keep consistent as the latest app change proves... Really disappointed in this latest software update. Please undo this change at a minimum, and add greater resolution if possible.

Every time they "update" this app, my device works worse and worse. Now, after 9 attempts in a row, I can't get any reading at all. All it says is it couldn't get an accurate reading and make sure to keep the device away from my face. Yeah, no kidding, I've had my Keyto since it first hit the market. I keep it on the table next to me while it's loading. There is absolutely no way my breath is hitting it while it's warming up. Either this app is trash or the device itself is garbage now.
Bought the keyto pen and three months later started working half the time. Then it just quit altogether. Company no help solving problem. Don't waste your money on the keyto pen.

need to watch screen entire time untilnready, no means of alarm or notification, meaning you are staring at screen for 2 minutes while it warms up. blood test doesnt seem nearly as bad all of a sudden. also, frequently loses association to phone and requires reboot to fix. Edit as of 6/20 and one year of use it hasn't gotten any better and in fact gets worse. It errors out about 95% of the time which wouldn't even be that bad if it eventually worked and didn't take several minutes to calibrate.
Very useful for tracking ketosis. I compared the breath meter to my blood meter and I was surprised how accurate it actually is. Highly recommend!

title: Easy Paleo Diet for Beginners
description:
Presenting Easy Paleo Diet Meal Plan for Beginners apps! The Paleo Diet is well-known diet that promotes many health benefits such as weight loss, reduces inflammation, boosts satiety, corrects nutrients deficiencies, regulate blood sugar and many more. This type of diet focuses on healthy eating lifestyle and less restrict when it comes to calorie-counting. It is all about learning to eat clean without any highly processed food. There are 7 days (1 week) easy meal plan menu provided in this apps. All of the ingredients are easy and simple to prepare and straight forward guidelines. You may also check out the grocery shopping list provided in this apps for easy references on your fingertips anywhere you go! 

There are several essential things that you should know about following this Paleo Diet, this diet is not about starving yourself and going hungry, you’ll be eating plenty of veggies, protein and healthy fats to feel satisfied and full. In addition to that, it is sustainable. People who follow this type of diet find that it’s not a fad diet that’s hard to stick to. It’s a sustainable lifestyle, since it’s all about learning to eat clean. This is great if you’re looking to lose weight healthily! Paleo Diet helps you will feel less bloating too! When you cut out processed food, salty foods and take in plenty of fiber you’ll find that you’re less bloated. Fourthly, the Paleo Diet is all about eating healthy, unprocessed foods. Once you get over your cravings for sugar and unhealthy foods. You’ll finally be free of them! Lastly, this type of diet isn’t about eating meat only.  It’s about eating balance food. If you follow it properly, you’ll enjoy a diet high in fruits and vegetables. This is great for your health and weight loss potential.

If you’re looking for healthy balance diet and eating clean as a kick-start to lose weight, then this is the right apps for you! There are variety versions of Paleo Diet meal plan. There are no “right” ways to follow this diet plan due to the paleo community has evolved over the years and many of them allow some modern foods that sciences has shown to be healthy. The main rules of these diet is strictly avoid eating highly processed food.  Make sure to drink plenty of plain water throughout your Paleo Diet process. At least 8 to 10 glasses per day.  

Apps features:
-Overview about the Diet (List of Health Benefits from Paleo Diet)
-Meal Plan Menu (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner)
-Paleo Snacks Ideas (List of Ideas of Paleo Snacks)
-Paleo Grocery Shopping List
-Food to Eat and Avoid
-Apps Info (Apps guide, disclaimer, privacy policy and more apps)

Finally, we wish you a great success on your diet journey! Have a nice day!

title: 14 Day Keto Diet Plan
description:
ABOUT THE APP. (14 DAY KETO DIET PLAN)

This App follows the ketogenic diet guidelines. I made this diet plan easy to follow and included Nutrition Fact for each meal and day. By following this plan, you won’t have to track your carb intake or other macro-nutrients. Apart from the diet plan itself, you will find useful tips and basic ketogenic diet guidelines.

Before I got to the diet plan I outlined the basic principles of the ketogenic diet. As long as you follow my plan you shouldn’t worry about your macro nutrient intake. I’ve designed it with moderate fat loss in mind so daily calories are about 1,500 - 1,600 kcal. If you suffer from any health conditions make sure you consult a health professional.But trust me,this is a better way to burn out your stubborn fats effectively and FASTER!

1.Overview Of Keto Diet
2.Benefits
3.Side Effects
4.Keto Foods to (Eat Anytime, Eat Occasionally, Avoid)

title: Low Carb Keto Diet
description:
WITH THIS APP AS YOUR GUIDE, you can easily make the lifestyle change millions of other people have successfully made. You can feel and look great by eating food that’s healthy, natural, and delicious. It will benefit your mental and physical health and provide constant energy throughout your day. To be successful, you’ll need to understand the very basics of your body and dieting.

Low-fat, low-calorie, gluten-free, Atkins, Weight Watchers, South Beach . . . the list of diets goes on. Most require you to starve yourself, eat bland, uninspiring food, strictly count calories, or go through various induction phases. The major problem with these diets is that they aren’t always nutritionally sound and they’re certainly not satisfying. That’s simply not safe or sustainable. They are not a lifestyle.

What the more successful diets have in common is the reduction of foods rich in carbohydrates. Studies show that people who eat low-carb diets and don’t reduce calories lose more weight than people who eat low-fat diets and also reduce calories. In addition, low-carb dieters generally show more improvement for important health indicators like triglyceride, blood sugar, and insulin levels, and more.

This app contains proven recipes and tips on how you can make quick, easy Keto recipes. It will provide you with everything you need to know from tools, ingredients, and recipes to storage.

We hope you find the app useful and worth your time, send us your feedback and suggestion on how to improve our app. Lastly, please take a moment to rate this app if at all you find it beneficial.

title: BEST FOOD 4 YOUR BLOOD TYPE
description:
Introducing Best Food for your Blood Type apps. Blood type Diet at your fingertips – a quick, concise, and easy references inspired by Dr. Peter J. D’Adamo’s from his Bestselling books “Eat Right 4 your Blood Type”. D’Adamo claims that by eating-and limiting-certain food based on your blood type, you’ll harness your body’s natural ability to digest nutrients, burn fat, fight inflammation, and achieve overall health and wellness. 

“Research indicates that your blood type is a key genetic factor that influences many areas of health and well-being” – D’Adamo.

Thus, this apps created to provide handy references for grocery shopping, meal planning, or even eating in the restaurants. Easy to use. Simply select your blood type and click food categories provided for your references. 

Best food 4 your Blood Type features includes:

title: 1500 Calorie Diet
description:
1500 calorie menu plan is a well balanced and healthy diet plan that will help you to gradually lose weight and keep your body nourished with all necessary nutrients at the same time. Remember, if you want to lose a pound in a week (which is ideal weight loss approach) you need to cut down on about 500 calories a day. So if your daily caloric intake is 2000 calories then to lose a pound per week you need to lower that to 1500 calories and so forth. Before you choose this 1500 calorie menu, make sure it fits your dietary needs. The following healthy diet menu is planned for a week, so you get 7 free 1500 calorie menu plans.

Remember that healthy lifestyle will let you enjoy your life for years to come! So enjoy 1500 calorie diet.

title: Simple Low Carb Diet for Weight Loss Plan
description:
Introducing Simple Low Carb Diet for Weight Loss  Plan app as your one app planner to help you lose weight within 1 week. Research suggest that Low-Carb Diet contribute to weight loss as well as better health metrics. These diets have been widely used for decades, and are recommended by many healthcare professionals.

Best of all, calories need not actually be counted, or special ingredients used. What you need to do is eat whole foods to complete, balanced and fill the diet. However, in this Low Carb Diet app meal plan, each meals has approximately calories value provided on it as easier references and guides so you can be aware of your calories intake.

A low-carb diet means you’re eating fewer carbohydrates and more fat. This can also be referred to as a low-carb, high-fat diet (LCHF), or keto.
Findings indicate there is actually no need to be afraid of natural fats. Low-Carb Diet fat is a new friend of yours. Simply reduce your intake of sugar and starch and you can eat all the fat you need to feel comfortable with. This will help you to improve and stabilizes your blood sugar in the body. Thus levels of the fat-storing hormone insulin drop and this increases fat burning and makes you feel more satiated, reducing food consumption and causing you to lose weight.

The Basic of Low Carb Diet:
Eat: Meat, fish, eggs, vegetables growing above ground and natural fats (like butter).

Avoid: Sugar and starchy foods (like bread, pasta, rice, beans and potatoes).

Eat when you're hungry and if you're satisfied stop. It could be as simple as that. You don't have to count calories or calculate your food intakes. 

This simple Low Carb Diet for Weight Loss Plan App have features includes:
-	Overview of Low Carb Diet
-	7 Days Low Carb Diet Meal Plan Menu (Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner)
-	Healthy Snacks Ideas for Low Carb Diet Plan
-	Grocery Shopping List (Preparation before undergo Low Carb Diet journey)
-	Side Effects of Low Carb Diet (Short-term / Long-term effect)
-	BMI Calculator (Underweight, Normal Weight, & Over Weight)
-	Jotter Notes Functions (You can write down your shopping list or act as mini diary for your Low Carb Diet journey.
-	App Info ( App Guidelines, Privacy Policy & Disclaimer)

IMPORTANT NOTES:
This type of Diet is STRICTLY NOT SUITABLE for people that have severe chronic medication like Diabetes, or High Blood Pressure. This type of Low Carb Diet also is not suitable for mother who currently on breastfeeding. Please consult your doctor before taking any type of diet.

Finally, we wish you good luck and all the best on your Low Carb Diet journey!

ADS:
There are ads in this app. Images for this app are stored on the internet and this costs money. The application is free, it does not promote any paid version of this app. Thus, the only way to support future development is to include ads. Please treat that with understanding.

title: Keto Diet Meal Plan
description:
Keto Diet Meal Plan

So you've decided you want to try out the high-fat, low-carb diet, better-known as the fat-burning ketogenic diet. Whether it's to lose weight, have more energy, or fuel workouts differently, going keto is a popular choice right now. But figuring out a keto meal plan on your own is no easy feat, especially since eating a diet super high in fats doesn't come naturally to many people who are accustomed to the traditionally carb-heavy American diet. (It's especially hard if you're vegan and want to try keto.) But this should help: Keto experts explain how to set yourself up for success, plus provide ideas for exactly what keto foods to eat when you're first getting started. (While you're at it, check out these low-carb keto drinks that will keep you in ketosis.)

In this app we will discuss:

keto diet
keto diet plan
keto diet meal plan
ketogenic diet meal plan
ketogenic diet menu
ketogenic
ketogenic diet foods
ketogenic diet book
keto diet foods
keto diet food list
keto diet menu plan
keto diet menu
ketogenic diet for dummies
ketogenic diet made easy

feature on the app

update once a week
useful tips that we will provide
a very simple look in the app


little explanation about Keto Diet Meal Plan

Have a Keto Meal Plan
When it comes to starting the keto diet a dietitian based in York, PA, who specializes in the ketogenic diet. "Set a start date and get prepared by reorganizing your pantry, planning out meal and snack options, and purchasing appropriate foods and dietary supplements," she says. "The biggest reason people have a hard time sticking with keto is that people don't have enough interesting foods to turn to, and high-carb favorites win out over good intention. If you didn't buy foods at the grocery store that fit the guidelines, there won't be an easy option in the fridge when you really need it." (A great place to start is this list of high-fat keto foods anyone can add to their diet.)

Keto Foods Meal Plan
While it will probably take a little bit of trial and error to figure out your go-to meals while doing keto, here's a sample keto meal plan to get you started.

Breakfast
Option 1: Spinach, mushroom, and feta omelet with keto coffee (coffee with adding fat such as MCT oil, butter, or bone broth protein). "This breakfast is a good source of protein and healthy fats that will keep you feeling full to curb midmorning cravings," says Dr. Axe.

Option 2: Whole milk, unsweetened yogurt mixed with full-fat sour cream, a few raspberries, chia seeds, and walnuts. "This type of combo requires careful carb- and portion-counting since all yogurts naturally have lactose, which is a carb," says Stefanski. "Pairing it with a carb-free protein like two eggs can help balance out the macros."

Lunch
Option 1: Oven-baked salmon with broccoli. "This lunch features salmon, which is high in heart-healthy fats, as well as broccoli, which is low in carbs but high in fiber," says Dr. Axe.

Option 2: Stefanski suggests a salad with nitrate-free bacon, avocado, cheese, spicy pumpkin seeds, and a few grape tomatoes along with a low-carb, high-fat salad dressing like ranch or blue cheese.

Dinner
Option 1: Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, chicken breast, bacon, and Parmesan. "Rich in protein and super filling, this is the perfect meal to round out your day," says Dr. Axe. "Pair it with an olive oil dressing and plenty of cheese to up the fat content."

Option 2: Grass-fed ground beef sautéed with onions and low-carb tomato sauce. "This can be served with zucchini or shirataki low-carb noodles," says Stefanski. "In order to get the fat content up in the meal, the zucchini can be sautéed in olive oil or additional garlic-infused oil can be added directly to the sauce."

Keto Diet Meal Plan

So you've decided you want to try out the high-fat, low-carb diet, better-known as the fat-burning ketogenic diet. Whether it's to lose weight, have more energy, or fuel workouts differently, going keto is a popular choice right now. But figuring out a keto meal plan on your own is no easy feat, especially since eating a diet super high in fats doesn't come naturally to many people who are accustomed to the traditionally carb-heavy American diet. (It's especially hard if you're vegan and want to try keto.) But this should help: Keto experts explain how to set yourself up for success, plus provide ideas for exactly what keto foods to eat when you're first getting started. (While you're at it, check out these low-carb keto drinks that will keep you in ketosis.)

"Set a start date and get prepared by reorganizing your pantry, planning out meal and snack options, and purchasing appropriate foods and dietary supplements," she says. "The biggest reason people have a hard time sticking with keto is that people don't have enough interesting foods to turn to, and high-carb favorites win out over good intention. If you didn't buy foods at the grocery store that fit the guidelines, there won't be an easy option in the fridge when you really need it." title: No Carb Diet
description:
What foods you should eat depends on a few things, including how healthy you are, how much you exercise and how much weight you have to lose.
Consider all of this as a general guideline, not something written in stone.

A low-carb diet is a diet that restricts carbohydrates, such as those found in sugary foods, pasta and bread. It is high in protein, fat and healthy vegetables.
There are many different types of low-carb diets, and studies show that they can cause weight loss and improve health.
This is a detailed meal plan for a low-carb diet. What to eat, what to avoid and a sample low-carb menu for one week.

Be sure to consult your doctor before starting a no carb diet or any other type of diet.

title: Calories in food-calorie counter app-calories burn
description:
General list includes the information on energy, carbohydrates, proteins and fats content in 100 grams of food. Energy value is expressed in kilocalories (kcal). The app contains more than 7000 items, and for your convenience it is separated into sections, and food items are listed in alphabetic order. Data in table are maximally exact, but you shall remeber that cooking peculiarities of some food influence the energy value and content of proteins, fats and carbohydrates.

Food Calories Charts helps you estimate how much calories are present per servings of the
food you are eating.

Now prepare you balanced diet with this app.
It is useful for everyone who is interested in maintaining a balanced diet and would
like to control their calorie intake.

This free health app is popular amount categories who are looking for health & fitness
in terms of good food and healthy diet.

It's vital to know about the food before adding it to your daily diet.

My Food Calorie helps you check the calories and the nutrition level your food contains.
It even lets you know what percentage of carbohydrates, proteins, fats, minerals, vitamins and lipids your food contains. You can even calculate it by changing the quantity of the food items.
And since, My Food Calorie is an offline app, you can use it anywhere anytime.

How to Use

Just start entering the name of your favorite food item in the search bar. Select the food item from the drop-down suggestions. That’s it!
With Calories in Food App, be informed and choose wisely which food to eat and which not to.


Features

• Search calories in food items among 25 categories, across more than 7000 plus food items
• Calculate micro and macro nutrients present in the food items
• Macro nutrients such as carbohydrates, proteins and fats
• Micro nutrients such as minerals and vitamins
• Select any weight to calculate the calories and other nutrients

title: 100 + Keto Diet Meals
description:
ABOUT THE APP:

Keto Diet app provides information needed to get the best Ketogenic Diet low carb program on the go. You will never miss out your favorite keto food recipes and it is always be update timely. Learn what to expect when you are getting into the ketogenic diet program and it side effect towards your body. You will also learn the benefits of the diet program for your health and to start your first keto meal diet, you can follow the one week keto meal plan which is provide just for your. Make your own keto diet meal with over 100+ of various different taste and delicious recipe to choose from.

WHAT IS KETOGENIC DIET OR KETO DIET ?

The ketogenic diet is a very low-carb diet plan that was originally designed in the 1920s for patients with epilepsy by researchers working at Johns Hopkins Medical Center. Researchers found that fasting avoiding consumption of all foods for a brief period of time, including those that provide carbohydrates helped reduce the amount of seizures patients suffered, in addition to having other positive effects on body fat, blood sugar, cholesterol and hunger levels.

WHAT IS KETOSIS ?

Ketosis is the result of following the standard ketogenic diet, which is why it’s also sometimes called “the ketosis diet.” Ketosis takes place when glucose from carbohydrate foods (like grains, all sources of sugar or fruit, for example) is drastically reduced, which forces the body to find an alternative fuel source: fat. Although dietary fat (especially saturated fat) often gets a bad name, provoking fear of weight gain and heart disease, it’s also your body’s second preferred source of energy when carbohydrates are not easily accessible.

FEATURES OF THE APP:

1. Keto Diet Overview (Introduction, Benefits, Side Effects, Diet, Tips).
2. Dieting Principles.
3. Meals
4. Recipes (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Desserts, Snacks, Side Dishes, Condiments, Cooker's Recipe & Appetizers)
5. Keto Exercise (Types and programmes)
6. Calorie Calculator
7. BMI Calculator

Download the Keto Diet App now to be prepare for your Ketogenic Diet Plan Program kick start right here in the Google Play Store.

title: Keto Diet Prime: Recipes, Diet Tracker, Calculator
description:
Keto Diet Prime is your app of choice if you want to live the ketogenic diet lifestyle. We have included an ketogenic eating plan, tutorials, food table and many recipes (like recipes from Bangla, Ghana, Hindi, Kenya, India, Kerala, Urdu, UK, South Africa, Greek, Malayalam, Philippines, Pakistan, Español, New Zealand, Austrlia, Arabic, Tamil, Telugu, South India, Pakistani, Asian including snacks, smoothies, vegetarian, desserts, etc.) from various regions. We help you to discover the ketogenic diet while at the same time eating well and achieving your desired weight.

Top features of the app:
● Free Keto diet tracker since all of our recipes have calorie information
● Essentially the app is your paleo manager which is both suitable für beginners and professionals who already know the basics
● We provide a big collection with full day meal of keto recipes for free (includes cookbook, desserts, drinks, fasting recipes, etc.) which are also provided offline
● Check out our ketogenic calculator and diet app tracker, especially intersting for those of you who want to lose weight  (also with integrated carb tracker)
● We got inspired by some of Dr Berg recipes
● The ultimate keto guide with tipps for a keto workout and exercises (also information on intermittent fasting and weight gain)
● Tipps for a keto diet plan for free (28 or 30 days, and also for women over 50) with a tailored meal plan
● Search function for foods if they fit into your regime
● Shopping list that makes shopping easier (with keto and carb manager and counter)
● We offer a keto paid and pro version as well, which is ad free

Available in the following languages:
German
English
Spanish
Italian
Portuguese
French
Hindi
Bengali
Russian

Try it and download the app for free!

Contact: http://scalevertising.com/
Privacy Policy: http://scalevertising.com/?page_id=90

INFORMATION ON USING THE APP AND SUBSCRIPTION
The download and use of our apps are free. Get the Premium App with many featured features. This feature is available in the app as a subscription. An automatic subscription renewal will be made if not canceled up to 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. The next subscription period fee will be deducted from your bank account up to 24 hours before the end of your current subscription. An existing subscription completed in the app can not be canceled. However, you can disable the auto-renewal feature in your Google Play account settings.

title: BeatO SMART Diabetes Management
description:
It’s time to manage & monitor your diabetes in a SMART way! Go for BeatO, it is India’s leading diabetes management platform that provides a complete solution for all the daily needs of a diabetic.

BeatO combines cost-effective IoT hardware – the BeatO smartphone-connected glucose meters SMART & CURV – with the BeatO App to support end-to-end management for users. BeatO App is undoubtedly the best diabetes monitoring app through which you can get advice from certified doctors & nutritionists.

This diabetes tracker app is also very helpful in scheduling your medication deliveries & diagnostic services. You can also read & watch diabetes-focused content and buy specially curated diabetes-friendly foods, drinks & wellness products.

☆ Trusted by over 1 Lakh diabetic users, BeatO is the most popular Diabetes Management app.❤️

➡ We have helped users reduce their HbA1C levels by 1%p, which in turn has reduced their complication risk by 33%.✅

☆ BeatO App at a Glance
•	Automated personalised notifications based on your sugar readings
•	AI-driven nudging and triaging system
•	Estimated HbA1c based on the average of your sugar levels
•	Proactive doctor and medical specialist support via BeatO’s Virtual Endocrine Clinic
•	Emergency alerts to family & loved ones when readings are out of controlled range
•	Auto save readings, get trends & analysis using this sugar test app
•	Shop for diabetes-friendly foods, drinks & wellness products
•	Medicine reminders
•	Offers on medicines & lab tests all year round

BeatO Glucometer is an ideal sugar testing machine which is powered by our blood sugar test app, check out the features below:

1.	BeatO SMART Blood Sugar Tracker – Use BeatO glucometer (ISO and CE certified) with our feature-rich blood sugar App known as BeatO App for accurate blood sugar readings. Small in size, it gives you accurate sugar results in no time & the advantage of manually logging the readings.

2.	FREE Doctor and Dietician Consultations - FREE BeatO care round the clock! Consult top doctors & our team of medical experts (dieticians) who continuously monitor your sugar levels and can be reached out on-call or chat. Managing diabetes was never so easy!

3.	BeatO Rewards Program – Our reward points program has been specifically designed to drive compliance amongst our users for regular monitoring and better management of blood glucose levels.

4.	Logs and Trends - BeatO App uses colour coding to depict high, low and normal blood sugar levels. All blood glucose readings are automatically saved in the app blood sugar logbook and can be analysed with simple graphs.

5.	Emergency Alerts – You can choose to share readings which are out of controlled range with family, doctor and trusted contacts through automatic SMS alerts

6.	Save Big on Medicines – Buy medicines and order lab tests through BeatO App at an attractive discount. You get the convenience of free doorstep delivery, no min order value and COD.

7.	Diabetes-Friendly Range – We offer diabetes-friendly foods, drinks and wellness products.

8.	Sync your Fitness Tracker - Find out the calories you burn by syncing your fitness tracker to track your steps. This sugar checking app is compatible with Google Fit to show a unified view of your health & activity data.

SUPPORT
To improve BeatO Diabetes App, we are open for new ideas and suggestions. For any feedback connect with us at:

👉facebook.com/beatoapp

👉twitter.com/beatoapp

###

BeatO Diabetes App in Hindi - अब आप की सुविधा के लिए BeatO मधुमेह एप्लिकेशन हिंदी में भी उपलब्ध है| जानिए डायबिटीज़ के लक्षण और कीजिये इलाज हमारे ग्लूकोज़ नापने वाले यन्त्र और एप के साथ|

comments: The app is working pretty well. The readings represent that of the lab and quote accurate. I love using this app. The only issue I have is continuous pricking which pai bs at the end of day. Will however need to observe a couple of cycles with the lab report to understand the deviation if any.Wireless feature in future would also be better as frequent fixing and removing in cherging slot could damage this in the long run.Dev, of Marketing, Geetha in tech were cooperative at every stage

Writing this review after using the app over 18 months now. I even took subscription and extremely happy with the decision I made. There are minor glitches in app sometimes, but support team is very good to resolve issues as soon as possible. Special mention to: Shrija and Devender for that quick support when I encountered issue with app.

Very Good App.Helpful in managing the Diabetes.but glucometer malfunctioning sometimes & hence strips used more. *Update can't be done without deleting some apps which are useful. Update not possible due to above reason.& hence can't take advantage of updated APPs. Please do something so that your Apps can be updated without deleting any existing apps. 19/10/2020. Very good App. It helps in controlling blood sugar levels. Dr.'s follow up is also appreciable in critical condition. Thanks a lot .

After one year the glucometer stopped working. On complaint the company said to buy a new meter. On purchase it worked only once. Then it stopped working. Now there is no meter to monitor my blood sugar. Two different smart phones I have tried and of no use.

Very helpful app for monitoring the blood sugar levels. The facility is that i dont need to go to the Lab, where the blood test charges are high and also risk of infection is very high. This is more economic and cost effective.

title: Nooddle - Eat healthy with what’s in your fridge.
description:
Easy, healthy recipes with what’s in your fridge. Have you ever got home from work, got hungry, open your fridge and ups... you don’t know what to eat? Nooddle helps you improvise in a healthy way with the ingredients you have at hand. So you end up eating healthier and reducing food waste. That simple.

So, how does it work?  

Find recipes by ingredients you already have

Input ingredients you have in your fridge or pantry and Nooddle will recommend you easy and healthy recipes with those ingredients, to cook in 20 minutes or less.

Personalized recommendations

Nooddle allows you to customize your searches with your food preferences and restrictions. So you can indicate if:
- you follow a vegetarian, pescetarian or vegan diet
- you have food allergies or intolerances
- there are ingredients you dislike or want to eliminate from your diet

Highly curated content

All the recipes from Nooddle are ours. Carefully curated and developed by our Spanish team, inspired in the delicious Mediterranean diet, and reviewed by our nutritional experts. Easy, doable, simple, delicious, healthy recipes with everyday ingredients. A healthy you has never been so easy. And so, to reduce food waste, and do something for the planet.

What others are saying about us?

“Nooddle, the new app for healthy and easy recipes, with what you have in your fridge... You're gonna love it!" - Elle

“Designed for those who want to eat healthy but cannot afford to invest too much time cooking” - Women’s Health

“Nooddle, the recipe app that helps you eat healthy with what you have at hand” - Runner’s World

Do you have any question? Write us to hello@nooddle.es

title: 7 Days Keto Diet for Weight Loss Meal Plan
description:
Introducing 7 Days Keto Diet for Weight Loss Meal Plan App! This is a complete guide especially for those who just starting to take on diet journey with Keto diet. Suitable for beginners. Simply follow the instructions on the Keto Diet Meal Plan menu. 

The ketogenic diet is a highly fat diet with very low-carb and many similarities with the Atkins and low carb diets. You should consume more fat and small quantities of carbs to get ketosis started. 

Ketosis is a condition in which the body switches main fuel into ketones (instead of glucose).  Consistent, disciplined and following the given dietary guidelines are the best way to attain your ideal body.

How Does Keto Work?
The intake of carbohydrates is significantly reduced and fat is replaced. The decrease in carbs consumption puts your body in a metabolic state called ketosis. 

When this happens, your body becomes incredibly efficient at burning fat for energy. It also transforms fat into ketones in the liver that will also supply energy to the brain.

Health Benefits of Keto:
-More weight loss
-Reduce your appetite
-Constant energy and mental clarity
-Reduced blood sugar and insulin levels
-May lower blood pressure
-Effective against metabolic syndrome
-Improved 'bad' LDL cholesterol levels
-Therapeutic for several brain disorders

The Apps Feature highlights:
1. About the Diet (Overview, How Does it works, how to start?)
2. 7 Days Meal Plan Menu (Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner)
3. Add Menu Info (Food List, Recommended, Limit, Not Allowed)
4. Cautions Diet (Side Effect, Reduce effect of Ketogenic Diet)
5. BMI Tracker (Normal, Underweight, Overweight Calculator)
6. Extra Keto Info (What to eat)
7. App Info (Privacy Policy & Disclaimer)

Let’s start this Keto Diet to burn fat fast today! Download now for FREE!

Important Notes:
The choice of following this diet must be made at your own risk. Please consult your doctor if needed.

Ketosis is a condition in which the body switches main fuel into ketones (instead of glucose). Consistent, disciplined and following the given dietary guidelines are the best way to attain your ideal body.

How Does Keto Work?
The intake of carbohydrates is significantly reduced and fat is replaced. The decrease in carbs consumption puts your body in a metabolic state called ketosis.

When this happens, your body becomes incredibly efficient at burning fat for energy. It also transforms fat into ketones in the liver that will also supply energy to the brain.

Health Benefits of Keto:
-More weight loss
-Reduce your appetite
-Constant energy and mental clarity
-Reduced blood sugar and insulin levels
-May lower blood pressure
-Effective against metabolic syndrome
-Improved 'bad' LDL cholesterol levels
-Therapeutic for several brain disorders

The Apps Feature highlights:
1. About the Diet (Overview, How Does it works, how to start?)
2. 7 Days Meal Plan Menu (Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner)
3. Add Menu Info (Food List, Recommended, Limit, Not Allowed)
4. Cautions Diet (Side Effect, Reduce effect of Ketogenic Diet)
5. BMI Tracker (Normal, Underweight, Overweight Calculator)
6. Extra Keto Info (What to eat)
7. App Info (Privacy Policy & Disclaimer)

Let’s start this Keto Diet to burn fat fast today! Download now for FREE!

Important Notes:
The choice of following this diet must be made at your own risk. Please consult your doctor if needed.

title: Ketogenic Diet Meal Plan : Cookbook Recipes App
description:
Ketogenic Diet Meal Plan : Cookbook Recipes App is a ketogenic diet app that contains 30 days ketogenic diet meal plan with low carb food list.

Ketogenic comes from the word “ketosis“, which is a state in which your body breaks down fat molecules into ketones to provide energy. This state is achieved through very low carbohydrate intake and higher than normal fat intake. The “normal” state of the body’s metabolism is called “glycolysis”, where carbs are burnt for energy. The long and short is that when your body is in carb-burning mode, it will use all available carbs for energy before it touches stored fat. In ketosis, your body is primed to burn fat, and this is great news for anyone trying to get trim and slim by using ourKetogenic Diet Meal Plan : Cookbook Recipes App.
